EU S-ORG
rejects O
German S-MISC
call O
to O
boycott O
British S-MISC
lamb O
. O

Peter B-PERSON
Blackburn E-PERSON

BRUSSELS S-LOC
1996-08-22 O

The O
European B-ORG
Commission E-ORG
said O
on O
Thursday O
it O
disagreed O
with O
German S-MISC
advice O
to O
consumers O
to O
shun O
British S-MISC
lamb O
until O
scientists O
determine O
whether O
mad O
cow O
disease O
can O
be O
transmitted O
to O
sheep O
. O

Germany S-LOC
's O
representative O
to O
the O
European B-ORG
Union E-ORG
's O
veterinary O
committee O
Werner B-PERSON
Zwingmann E-PERSON
said O
on O
Wednesday O
consumers O
should O
buy O
sheepmeat O
from O
countries O
other O
than O
Britain S-LOC
until O
the O
scientific O
advice O
was O
clearer O
. O

" O
We O
do O
n't O
support O
any O
such O
recommendation O
because O
we O
do O
n't O
see O
any O
grounds O
for O
it O
, O
" O
the O
Commission S-ORG
's O
chief O
spokesman O
Nikolaus B-PERSON
van I-PERSON
der I-PERSON
Pas E-PERSON
told O
a O
news O
briefing O
. O

He O
said O
further O
scientific O
study O
was O
required O
and O
if O
it O
was O
found O
that O
action O
was O
needed O
it O
should O
be O
taken O
by O
the O
European B-ORG
Union E-ORG
. O

He O
said O
a O
proposal O
last O
month O
by O
EU S-ORG
Farm O
Commissioner O
Franz B-PERSON
Fischler E-PERSON
to O
ban O
sheep O
brains O
, O
spleens O
and O
spinal O
cords O
from O
the O
human O
and O
animal O
food O
chains O
was O
a O
highly O
specific O
and O
precautionary O
move O
to O
protect O
human O
health O
. O

Fischler S-PERSON
proposed O
EU-wide S-MISC
measures O
after O
reports O
from O
Britain S-LOC
and O
France S-LOC
that O
under O
laboratory O
conditions O
sheep O
could O
contract O
Bovine B-MISC
Spongiform I-MISC
Encephalopathy E-MISC
( O
BSE S-MISC
) O
-- O
mad O
cow O
disease O
. O

But O
Fischler S-PERSON
agreed O
to O
review O
his O
proposal O
after O
the O
EU S-ORG
's O
standing O
veterinary O
committee O
, O
mational O
animal O
health O
officials O
, O
questioned O
if O
such O
action O
was O
justified O
as O
there O
was O
only O
a O
slight O
risk O
to O
human O
health O
. O

Spanish S-MISC
Farm O
Minister O
Loyola B-PERSON
de I-PERSON
Palacio E-PERSON
had O
earlier O
accused O
Fischler S-PERSON
at O
an O
EU S-ORG
farm O
ministers O
' O
meeting O
of O
causing O
unjustified O
alarm O
through O
" O
dangerous O
generalisation O
. O
" O

. O

Only O
France S-LOC
and O
Britain S-LOC
backed O
Fischler S-PERSON
's O
proposal O
. O

The O
EU S-ORG
's O
scientific O
veterinary O
and O
multidisciplinary O
committees O
are O
due O
to O
re-examine O
the O
issue O
early O
next O
month O
and O
make O
recommendations O
to O
the O
senior O
veterinary O
officials O
. O

Sheep O
have O
long O
been O
known O
to O
contract O
scrapie O
, O
a O
brain-wasting O
disease O
similar O
to O
BSE S-MISC
which O
is O
believed O
to O
have O
been O
transferred O
to O
cattle O
through O
feed O
containing O
animal O
waste O
. O

British S-MISC
farmers O
denied O
on O
Thursday O
there O
was O
any O
danger O
to O
human O
health O
from O
their O
sheep O
, O
but O
expressed O

that O
German S-MISC
government O
advice O
to O
consumers O
to O
avoid O
British S-MISC
lamb O
might O
influence O
consumers O
across O
Europe S-LOC
. O

" O

we O

to O
be O
extremely O

of O
is O
how O
other O
countries O
are O
going O
to O
take O

's O
lead O
, O
" O
Welsh B-ORG
National I-ORG
Farmers I-ORG
' I-ORG
Union E-ORG
( O
NFU S-ORG
) O
chairman O
John B-PERSON

Jones E-PERSON
said O
on O
BBC B-ORG

. O

Bonn S-LOC
has O
led O
efforts O
to O
protect O
public O
health O
after O
consumer O

collapsed O
in O

after O

could O

to O

. O

from O

last O

FRANKFURT S-LOC
1996-08-22 O

German S-MISC
first-time O
registrations O
of O
motor O
vehicles O
jumped O
14.2 O
percent O
in O
July O
this O
year O
from O
the O
year-earlier O
period O
, O
the O
Federal B-ORG
office I-ORG
for I-ORG
motor I-ORG
vehicles E-ORG
said O
on O
Thursday O
. O

The O
office O
said O
356,725 O
new O
cars O
were O
registered O
in O
July O
1996 O
-- O
304,850 O
passenger O
cars O
and O
15,613 O
trucks O
. O

The O
figures O
represent O
a O
13.6 O
percent O
increase O
for O
passenger O
cars O
and O
a O
2.2 O
percent O
decline O
for O
trucks O
from O
July O
1995 O
. O

Motor-bike O
registration O
rose O
32.7 O
percent O
in O
the O
period O
. O

The O
growth O
was O
partly O
due O
to O
an O
increased O
number O
of O
Germans S-MISC
buying O
German S-MISC
cars O
abroad O
, O
while O
manufacturers O
said O
that O
domestic O
demand O
was O
weak O
, O
the O
federal O
office O
said O
. O

Almost O
all O
German S-MISC
car O
manufacturers O
posted O
gains O
in O
registration O
numbers O
in O
the O
period O
. O

Volkswagen B-ORG
AG E-ORG
won O
77,719 O
registrations O
, O
slightly O
more O
than O
a O
quarter O
of O
the O
total O
. O

Opel B-ORG
AG E-ORG
together O
with O
General B-ORG
Motors E-ORG
came O
in O
second O
place O
with O
49,269 O
registrations O
, O
16.4 O
percent O
of O
the O
overall O
figure O
. O

Third O

Ford S-ORG
with O
35,563 O
registrations O
, O
or O
11.7 O
percent O
. O

Only O
Seat S-ORG
and O
Porsche S-ORG
had O
fewer O

in O
July O
1996 O
compared O
to O
last O
year O
's O
July O
. O

3,420 O

with O
5522 O

in O
July O
a O
year O

. O

's O

to O
554 O
from O
643 O
. O

Colleen B-PERSON

's O
outgoing O

with O

on O
Thursday O

tensions O
between O
the O

to O

a O

in O

. O

Itamar B-PERSON
Rabinovich E-PERSON
, O

. O

" O

There O
are O
too O
many O
holes O
in O
what O
we O
know O
, O
and O
these O
must O
be O
filled O
very O
quickly O
. O
" O

Bonn S-LOC
has O
led O
efforts O
to O
ensure O
consumer O
protection O
tops O
the O
list O
of O
priorities O
in O
dealing O
with O
the O
mad O
cow O
crisis O
, O
which O
erupted O
in O
March O
when O
Britain S-LOC
acknowledged O
humans O
could O
contract O
a O
similar O
illness O
by O
eating O
contaminated O
beef O
. O

The O
European B-ORG
Commission E-ORG
agreed O
this O
month O
to O
rethink O
a O
proposal O
to O
ban O
the O
use O
of O
suspect O
sheep O
tissue O
after O
some O
EU S-ORG
veterinary O
experts O
questioned O
whether O
it O
was O
justified O
. O

EU S-ORG
Farm O
Commissioner O
Franz B-PERSON
Fischler E-PERSON
had O
proposed O
banning O
sheep O
brains O
, O
spleens O
and O
spinal O
cords O
from O
the O
human O
and O
animal O
food O
chains O
after O
reports O
from O
Britain S-LOC
and O
France S-LOC
that O
under O
laboratory O
conditions O
sheep O
could O
contract O
Bovine B-MISC
Spongiform I-MISC
Encephalopathy E-MISC
( O
BSE S-MISC
) O
-- O
mad O
cow O
disease O
. O

But O
some O
members O
of O
the O
EU S-ORG
's O
standing O
veterinary O
committee O
questioned O
whether O
the O
action O
was O
necessary O
given O
the O
slight O

to O
human O
health O
. O

The O
question O
is O
being O
studied O
separately O
by O
two O
EU S-ORG

committees O
. O

Sheep O
have O
long O
been O
known O
to O
contract O
scrapie O
, O
a O
similar O

disease O
to O

to O
have O
been O
transferred O
to O
cattle O
through O
feed O
containing O
animal O
waste O
. O

British S-MISC
officials O
say O
sheep O
meat O
is O
perfectly O
safe O
to O
eat O
. O

ZDF S-ORG
said O
Germany S-LOC
imported O
47,600 O

from O
Britain S-LOC
last O
year O
, O
nearly O
half O
of O
total O
imports O
. O

It O
brought O
in O
4,275 O

of O
British S-MISC

, O
some O
10 O
percent O
of O
overall O
imports O
. O

- O

HIS O
DAVIS B-MISC
CUP E-MISC
FUTURE O
. O

SYDNEY S-LOC
1996-08-22 O

Australian S-MISC
Davis B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
captain O
John B-PERSON
Newcombe E-PERSON
on O
Thursday O
signalled O
his O
possible O
resignation O
if O
his O
team O
loses O
an O
away O
tie O
against O
Croatia S-LOC
next O
month O
. O

The O
former O
Wimbledon S-MISC
champion O
said O
the O
immediate O
future O
of O
Australia S-LOC
's O
Davis B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
coach O
Tony B-PERSON
Roche E-PERSON
could O
also O
be O
determined O
by O
events O
in O
Split S-LOC
. O

" O
If O
we O
lose O
this O
one O
, O
Tony S-PERSON
and O

will O
have O
to O
have O
a O
good O
look O
at O
giving O
someone O
else O
a O
go O
, O
" O
Newcombe S-PERSON
was O
quoted O
as O
saying O
in O
Sydney S-LOC
's O
Daily B-ORG
Telegraph E-ORG
newspaper O
. O

Australia S-LOC
face O
Croatia S-LOC
in O
the O
world O
group O
qualifying O
tie O
on O
clay O
from O
September O
20-22 O
. O

Under O
Newcombe S-PERSON
's O
leadership O
, O
Australia S-LOC
were O
relegated O
from O
the O
elite O
world O
group O
last O
year O
, O
the O
first O
time O
the O
26-time O
Davis B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
winners O
had O
slipped O
from O
the O
top O
rank O
. O

Since O
taking O
over O
as O
captain O
from O
Neale B-PERSON
Fraser E-PERSON
in O
1994 O
, O
Newcombe S-PERSON
's O
record O
in O
tandem O
with O
Roche S-PERSON
, O
his O
former O
doubles O
partner O
, O
has O
been O
three O
wins O
and O
three O
losses O
. O

Newcombe S-PERSON
has O
selected O
Wimbledon S-MISC
semifinalist O
Jason B-PERSON
Stoltenberg E-PERSON
, O
Patrick B-PERSON
Rafter E-PERSON
, O
Mark B-PERSON
Philippoussis E-PERSON
, O
and O
Olympic S-MISC
doubles O
champions O
Todd B-PERSON
Woodbridge E-PERSON
and O
Mark B-PERSON

to O
face O
the O
Croatians S-MISC
. O

The O
home O
side O
boasts O
world O
number O
six O
Goran B-PERSON

, O
and O

would O
be O

to O
beat O

Croatian S-MISC
number O
one O
. O

" O

must O

of O

. O

to O

of O

at O

by O

and O

' O

COLOMBO S-LOC

patrolled O
the O
ground O
when O

opened O

of O

with O
a O

over O

country O
's O

team O
on O
Thursday O
. O

Australia S-LOC
, O
in O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka E-LOC
for O
a O
limited O
overs O
tournament O
which O
also O
includes O
India S-LOC
and O
Zimbabwe S-LOC
, O
have O
been O
promised O

of O

, O

to O
the O
island O
since O

a O

in O

of O

over O

. O

, O

for O
seven O
from O

. O

way O

100 O

. O

The O

with O
246 O
for O
seven O
. O

In B-ORG
Home I-ORG

to O
appeal O

. O

MINNETONKA S-LOC
, O
Minn S-LOC
. O

1996-08-22 O

In B-ORG
Home I-ORG
Health I-ORG
Inc E-ORG
said O
on O
Thursday O
it O
will O
appeal O
to O
the O
U.S. B-ORG
Federal I-ORG
District I-ORG
Court E-ORG
in O
Minneapolis S-LOC
a O
decision O
by O
the O
Health B-ORG
Care I-ORG
Financing I-ORG
Administration E-ORG
( O
HCFA S-ORG
) O
that O
denied O
reimbursement O
of O
certain O
costs O
under O
Medicaid S-MISC
. O

The O
HCFA S-ORG
Administrator O
reversed O
a O
previously O
favorable O
decision O
regarding O
the O
reimbursement O
of O
costs O
related O
to O
the O
company O
's O
community O
liaison O
personnel O
, O
it O
added O
. O

The O
company O
said O
it O
continues O
to O
believe O
the O
majority O
of O
the O
community O
liaison O
costs O
are O
coverable O
under O
the O
terms O
of O
the O
Medicare S-MISC
program O
. O

" O
We O
are O
disappointed O
with O
the O
administrator O
's O
decision O
but O
we O
continue O
to O

Garlic O
pills O
do O
n't O
lower O
cholesterol O
, O
study O
finds O
. O

LONDON S-LOC
1996-08-22 O

Garlic O
pills O
may O
not O
lower O
blood O
cholesterol O
and O
studies O
that O
show O
they O
do O
may O
be O
flawed O
, O
British S-MISC
researchers O
have O
reported O
. O

A O
study O
by O
a O
team O
of O
doctors O
at O
Oxford B-ORG
University E-ORG
has O
found O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
do O
not O
benefit O
significantly O
from O
taking O
garlic O
tablets O
. O

The O
study O
involved O
115 O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
levels O
. O

They O
were O
given O
900 O
milligrams O
a O
day O
of O
dried O
garlic O
powder O
or O
placebo O
tablets O
. O
" O

There O
were O
no O
significant O
differences O
between O
the O
groups O
receiving O
garlic O
and O
placebo O
, O
" O
they O
wrote O
in O
the O
Journal B-ORG
of I-ORG
the I-ORG
Royal I-ORG
College I-ORG
of I-ORG
Physicians E-ORG
. O

Those O
taking O
part O
were O
told O
to O
eat O
a O
low-fat O
diet O
for O
six O
weeks O
before O
they O
started O
taking O
the O
pills O
, O
and O
their O
blood O
cholesterol O
measured O
before O
and O
after O
the O
six-week O
period O
. O

The O
researchers O
said O
this O
would O
make O
their O
findings O
more O
accurate O
. O

Several O
studies O
have O
found O
garlic O
pills O
can O
lower O
blood O
pressure O
and O
blood O
cholesterol O
. O

But O
the O
Oxford S-LOC
team O
disputed O
these O
findings O
and O
said O
either O
previous O
trials O
may O
have O
been O
interpreted O
incorrectly O
, O
those O
taking O
part O
were O
not O
given O
special O
diets O
beforehand O
or O
the O
duration O
of O
the O
studies O
may O
have O
been O
too O
short O
. O

The O
six-month O
trial O
was O
funded O
by O
the O
British B-ORG
Heart I-ORG
Foundation E-ORG
and O
Lichtwer B-ORG
Pharma I-ORG
GmbH E-ORG
, O
which O
makes O
Kwai S-MISC
brand O
garlic O
tablets O
. O

The O
study O
did O
not O
address O
whether O
whole O
garlic O
could O
affect O
cholesterol O
. O

-- O

Newsroom E-ORG

than O
in O
July O
1995 O
and O

Ukraine S-LOC
hails O
peace O
as O
marks O
five-year O
independence O
. O

Rostislav B-PERSON
Khotin E-PERSON

KIEV S-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Ukraine S-LOC
celebrates O
five O
years O
of O
independence O
from O
Kremlin S-LOC
rule O
on O
Saturday O
, O
hailing O
civil O
and O
inter-ethnic O
peace O
as O
its O
main O
post-Soviet S-MISC
achievement O
. O

Ukraine S-LOC
's O
declaration O
of O
independence O
in O
1991 O
, O
backed O
nine-to-one O
by O
a O
referendum O
in O
December O
of O
that O
year O
, O
effectively O
dealt O
a O
death O
blow O
to O
the O
Soviet S-MISC
empire O
and O
ended O
more O
than O
three O
centuries O
of O
rule O
from O
Moscow S-LOC
. O

Ukraine S-LOC
, O
with O
a O
Russian S-MISC
community O
of O
11 O
million O
people O
-- O
the O
world O
's O
largest O
outside O
Russia S-LOC
-- O
has O
avoided O
conflicts O
like O
those O
in O
Russia S-LOC
's O
Chechnya S-LOC
, O
neighbouring O
Moldova S-LOC
, O
and O
the O
former O
Soviet S-MISC
republics O
of O
Georgia S-LOC
, O
Azerbaijan S-LOC
and O
Tajikistan S-LOC
. O

" O
Ukraine S-LOC
's O
biggest O
achievements O
for O
five O
years O
are O
the O
preservation O
of O
civil O
peace O
and O
inter-ethnic O
harmony O
, O
" O
President O
Leonid B-PERSON
Kuchma E-PERSON
said O
in O
televised O
statement O
this O
week O
. O

" O
Unlike O
many O
other O
post-Soviet S-MISC
countries O
we O
were O
able O
to O
deal O
with O
conflict O
situations O
in O
a O
peaceful O
and O
civilised O
way O
. O
" O

But O
independence O
was O
initially O
accompanied O
by O
hyper-inflation O
and O
economic O
collapse O
, O
although O
there O
are O
signs O
of O
a O
turnaround O
. O

Inflation O
-- O
a O
hyper-inflationary O
10,300 O
percent O
a O
year O
in O
1993 O
-- O
was O
a O
respectable O
0.1 O
percent O
a O
month O
in O
June O
and O
July O
and O
the O
economy O
has O
just O
begun O
to O
grow O
. O

Kuchma S-PERSON
told O
a O
solemn O
ceremony O
at O
the O
Ukraina B-LOC
Palace E-LOC
on O
Friday O
that O
" O
there O
was O
a O
turning O
point O
" O
in O
reforms O
and O
that O
he O
expected O
a O
rise O
in O
the O
standard O
of O
living O
in O
the O
near O
future O
. O

" O
There O
is O
no O
doubt O
that O
economic O
growth O
has O
already O
started O
, O
" O
said O
Adelbert B-PERSON
Knobl E-PERSON
, O
head O
of O
the O
International B-ORG
Monetary I-ORG
Fund E-ORG
's O
mission O
in O
Ukraine S-LOC
. O
" O

national O
bank O
and O
the O

have O
every O

proud O
of O
their O

. O
" O

Central O

officials O
said O
on O
Thursday O
that O
a O
much-postponed O
hryvna O
currency O
would O
" O
definitely O
" O
be O
introduced O
before O
the O
end O
of O
this O
year O
. O

It O
will O
replace O
the O
interim O
karbovanets O
currency O
, O
which O
was O
introduced O
at O
par O
to O
the O
Russian S-MISC
rouble O
in O
1992 O
but O
now O
trades O
at O
almost O
33 O
karbovanets O
per O

. O

Ukraine S-LOC
has O
repeatedly O

to O
introduce O
the O
hryvna O
but O
had O
to O

the O

because O
of O
economic O

. O

Proud O
of O

in O
promptly O

both O
the O
Council B-ORG
of I-ORG

and O
NATO S-ORG
's O
Partnership B-MISC
for I-MISC

, O

this O

to O

a O

, O

visit O
. O

. O

Kiev S-LOC

said O

was O

. O

But O
Ukraine S-LOC
, O

itself O
as O

, O
is O
looking O
West O
as O

. O

" O

, O

Kuchma S-PERSON

, O

. O

, O

, O

to O

Marina B-PERSON

said O

goods O
had O
been O

under O
many O

, O

nothing O

. O

of O

$ O
1.10 O
billion O
in O
1995 O
. O

Barter O

were O
worth O
$ O
4.9 O
billion O
last O
year O
, O
or O
about O
eight O
percent O
of O
all O
Russian S-MISC
exports O
estimated O
at O
$ O
61.5 O
billion O
, O

. O

" O

of O

is O
too O

, O
so O
the O

share O
of O

in O

of O

higher O
, O
" O

. O

A O

President O
Boris B-PERSON
Yeltsin E-PERSON

on O
state O

of O

, O

" O

" O
. O

In O

, O

will O

on O

1 O
, O

will O

to O

worth O

of O

within O

. O

" O

, O

to O

worth O
the O

of O

, O
" O

. O

for O

, O

currently O
" O

" O
. O

Barter O
has O
always O
been O
a O
feature O
of O
the O
Soviet B-LOC
Union E-LOC
's O

, O

" O

" O

" O

CRICKET O
- O

LONDON S-LOC

England S-LOC
batsman O

Adrian B-PERSON
Warner E-PERSON

BRUSSELS S-LOC
1996-08-23 O

CRICKET O
- O
SRI B-LOC
LANKA E-LOC
AND O
AUSTRALIA S-LOC
SAY O
RELATIONS O
HAVE O
HEALED O
. O

COLOMBO S-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Sri B-LOC
Lanka E-LOC
and O
Australia S-LOC
agreed O
on O
Friday O
that O
relations O
between O
the O
two O
teams O
had O
healed O
since O
the O
Sri B-MISC
Lankans E-MISC
' O
acrimonious O
tour O
last O
year O
. O

The O
Sri B-MISC
Lankans E-MISC
were O
first O
found O
guilty O
then O
cleared O
of O
ball O
tampering O
and O
off-spinner O
Muttiah B-PERSON
Muralitharan E-PERSON
was O
called O
for O
throwing O
during O
a O
controversial O
three-test O
series O
in O
Australia S-LOC
. O

" O
Our O
concern O
is O
to O
get O
out O
there O
and O

, O

" O

for O

to O

, O

5 O

of O

Friday O

in O

Capital I-ORG
Trust E-ORG

. O

with O

and I-ORG

, O

said O

62,900 O
additional O

of O

Boston-based S-MISC

at O

Colombia S-LOC
, O
U.S. S-LOC
reach O
aviation O
agreement O
. O

MIAMI S-LOC
1996-08-23 O

The O
U.S. S-LOC
and O
Colombian S-MISC
governments O
reached O
an O
agreement O
that O
will O
allow O
AMR B-ORG
Corp E-ORG
's O
American B-ORG
Airlines E-ORG
to O
operate O
three O
round-trip O
flights O
between O
New B-LOC
York E-LOC
and O
Bogota S-LOC
, O
the O
Department B-ORG
of I-ORG
Transportation E-ORG
said O
Friday O
. O

Under O
the O
agreement O
, O
which O
followed O
talks O
in O
Miami S-LOC
this O
week O
, O
AMR S-ORG
also O
will O
be O
allowed O
to O
shift O
up O
to O
four O
of O
the O
weekly O
flights O
it O
now O
operates O
between O
Miami S-LOC
and O
Colombia S-LOC
to O
its O
New B-LOC
York E-LOC
gateway O
. O

The O
United B-LOC
States E-LOC
also O
will O
be O
able O
to O
designate O
one O
new O
all-cargo O
carrier O
for O
service O
between O
the O
two O
nations O
after O
two O
years O
. O

Colombia S-LOC
was O
permitted O
to O
add O
a O
single O
additional O
round-trip O
flight O
to O
its O
current O
New B-LOC
York E-LOC
service O
, O
although O
it O
will O
not O
be O
able O
to O
do O
so O
while O
under O
Category O
Two O
( O
Conditional O
) O
status O
under O
the O
Federal B-ORG
Aviation I-ORG
Administration E-ORG
's O
International B-MISC
Aviation I-MISC
Safety I-MISC
program E-MISC
. O

Colombia S-LOC
would O
be O
allowed O
to O
add O
new O
service O
when O
its O
safety O
assessment O
has O
been O
improved O
, O
the O
department O
said O
. O

With O
the O
exception O
of O
the O
new O
services O
just O
agreed O
to O
, O
the O
governments O
of O
the O
two O
nations O
have O
agreed O
to O
maintain O
their O
current O
level O
of O
routes O
and O
airlines O
for O
the O
next O
2-1/2 O
years O
, O
the O
agreement O
said O
. O

The O
agreement O
resolved O
a O
dispute O
that O
arose O
in O
June O
when O
Colombia S-LOC
turned O
down O
American S-ORG
's O
request O
to O
operate O
flights O
between O
New B-LOC
York E-LOC
and O
Bogota S-LOC
, O
a O
denial O
that O
prompted O
the O
United B-LOC
States E-LOC
to O
charge O
that O
the O
Colombians S-MISC
were O
breaking O
a O
bilateral O
aviation O
agreement O
and O
to O
propose O
sanctions O
against O
one O
of O
two O
Colombian S-MISC
airlines O
, O
Avianca S-ORG
and O
ACES S-ORG
. O

- O

. O

, O

, O
a O

for O

in O
the O

, O

trained O
a O
pair O
of O
sea O
lions O
to O
tag O
and O
photograph O
elusive O
whales O
as O
they O
cruise O
through O
the O
Pacific S-LOC
depths O
, O
New B-ORG
Scientist E-ORG
magazine O
reported O
on O
Thursday O
. O

James B-PERSON
Harvey E-PERSON
and O
Jennifer B-PERSON
Hurley E-PERSON
of O
the O
Moss B-ORG
Landing I-ORG
Marine I-ORG
Laboratories E-ORG
in O
California S-LOC
say O
their O
sea O
lions O
, O
natural O
companions O
of O
many O
species O
of O
whale O
, O
can O
go O
where O
no O

or O

has O
ever O
gone O
before O

" O

knows O
that O
when O

going O
you O
ca O
n't O
keep O
up O
, O
" O

" O

only O
about O
five O

do O
. O
" O

The O

-- O

and O

Sake S-PERSON
-- O
have O

six O

of O

. O

and O

is O

. O

they O

Up O
to O
100,000 O
tonnes O
of O

held O
in O

, O

the O
world O

as O
to O
its O

and O

, O
probably O
belongs O
to O
China S-LOC
's O

state O

, O

said O
on O

. O

40,000 O
tonnes O
of O

have O
already O
been O

to O

near O
the O
northern O
port O
of O

, O
where O
some O
of O

. O

has O

and O

since O

was O

into O

by O
the O
China B-ORG
National I-ORG
Nonferrous I-ORG

Import I-ORG
and I-ORG
Export I-ORG
Corp E-ORG
( O
CNIEC S-ORG
) O
in O
June O
and O
July O
. O

It O
was O

whether O
or O
not O
the O
40,000 O
tonnes O
had O

customs O
-- O

that O

, O

by O

government O
's O

Planning I-ORG

, O
owned O
the O

. O

Traders O
have O
said O

could O

on O

-- O

and O
17 O

-- O

otherwise O
. O

But O

of O
a O

, O
said O

. O

" O

, O

has O

Trading O

to O

back O
into O
a O

as O

had O
already O
served O
its O

in O

of O

on O

London B-ORG
Metal I-ORG
Exchange E-ORG
( O

) O
. O

A O

occurs O
when O
the O

price O
of O
a O

is O
higher O
than O
the O
forward O
price O
. O

CNIEC S-ORG

, O

SOCCER O
- O
DISAPPOINTING O
AJAX S-ORG
SLUMP O
2-0 O
AT O
HEERENVEEN S-LOC
. O

AMSTERDAM S-LOC
1996-08-24 O

Dutch S-MISC
champions O
Ajax B-ORG
Amsterdam E-ORG
faltered O
in O
their O
second O
league O
match O
of O
the O
season O
on O
Saturday O
losing O
2-0 O
away O
at O
Heerenveen S-ORG
. O

Ajax S-ORG
, O
who O
had O
a O
dismal O
series O
of O
pre-season O
results O
before O
beating O
NAC S-ORG
of O
Breda S-LOC
in O
their O
opening O
game O
, O
had O
the O
best O
of O
an O
entertaining O
first O
half O
but O
failed O
to O
break O
the O
deadlock O
. O

Eight O
minutes O
after O
the O
interval O
, O
Heerenveen S-ORG
's O
Romeo B-PERSON
Wouden E-PERSON
broke O
through O
the O
Amsterdam S-LOC
defence O
, O
left O
defender O
John B-PERSON
Veldman E-PERSON
standing O
and O
curled O
the O
ball O
beyond O
goalkeeper O
Edwin B-PERSON
van I-PERSON
der I-PERSON
Sar E-PERSON
into O
the O
Ajax S-ORG
net O
. O

Ajax S-ORG
, O
without O
injured O
defenders O
Marcio B-PERSON
Santos E-PERSON
and O
Winston B-PERSON
Bogarde E-PERSON
and O
strikers O
Jari B-PERSON
Litmanen E-PERSON
and O
Marc B-PERSON
Overmars E-PERSON
, O
then O
stepped O
up O
the O
pace O
and O
looked O
certain O
to O
equalise O
. O

But O
they O
left O
gaps O
at O
the O
back O
and O
on O
73 O
minutes O
Danish S-MISC
striker O
Jon B-PERSON
Dahl I-PERSON
Tomasson E-PERSON
rushed O
out O
of O
his O
own O
half O
, O
beat O
the O
Ajax S-ORG
defence O
and O
lobbed O
van B-PERSON
der I-PERSON
Sar E-PERSON
. O

The O
defeat O
means O
Ajax S-ORG
's O
main O
title O
contenders O

, O
who O
beat O
the O
champions O
3-0 O

British S-MISC
hostage O
in O
Chechnya S-LOC
describes O
ordeal O
. O

LONDON S-LOC
1996-08-24 O

A O
British S-MISC
aid O
worker O
, O
held O
hostage O
in O
Chechnya S-LOC
for O
nearly O
four O
weeks O
, O
said O
on O
Saturday O
a O
cocked O
Kalashnikov S-MISC
had O
been O
thrust O
into O
his O
mouth O
at O
one O
point O
during O
his O
ordeal O
. O

Michael B-PERSON
Penrose E-PERSON
, O
a O
23-year-old O
worker O
with O
the O
group O
Action B-ORG
Against I-ORG
Hunger E-ORG
, O
described O
his O
ordeal O
to O
a O
news O
conference O
when O
he O
arrived O
back O
in O
Britain S-LOC
from O
Moscow S-LOC
. O

" O
The O
worst O
period O
of O
physical O
manhandling O
was O
during O
that O
time O
when O
we O
were O
beaten O
with O
Kalashnikovs S-MISC
and O
at O
one O
point O
I O
had O
a O
Kalashnikov S-MISC
held O
to O
the O
back O
of O
my O
throat O
-- O
cocked O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

" O
For O
the O
first O
period O
we O
were O
held O
in O
a O
small O
room O
with O
no O
bed O
or O
anything O
. O

We O
had O
very O
little O
food O
and O
sometimes O
went O
two O
or O
three O
days O
without O
eating O
. O
" O

Gunmen O
seized O
Penrose S-PERSON
, O
who O
comes O
from O
Swerford S-LOC
in O
southern O
England S-LOC
, O
Frenchman S-MISC
Frederic B-PERSON
Malardeau E-PERSON
and O
six O
other O
hostages O
from O
their O
car O
in O
Grozny S-LOC
, O
the O
capital O
of O
Chechnya S-LOC
, O
on O
July O
27 O
. O

The O
assailants O
had O
demanded O
a O
ransom O
of O
300,000 O
pounds O
( O
$ O
465,000 O
) O
but O
no O
money O
was O
paid O
by O
the O
charity O
when O
they O
were O
released O
on O
Wednesday O
. O

The O
hostages O
were O
held O
in O
a O
house O
in O
or O
near O
Grozny S-LOC
which O
was O
bombarded O
regularly O
. O

" O
During O
the O
last O
15 O
days O
of O
being O
held O
, O
the O
fighting O
in O
Grozny S-LOC
was O
very O
close O
. O

At O
first O
it O
was O
street O
fighting O
outside O
the O
house O
and O
then O
we O
came O
under O
very O
heavy O
shelling O
and O
bombardment O
from O
conventional O
weapons O
like O
tanks O
, O
artillery O
and O
grenade O
launchers O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

Penrose S-PERSON
had O
been O
working O
for O
the O
charity O
which O
provides O
food O
to O
civilians O
for O
only O
a O
few O
weeks O
before O
he O
was O
captured O
. O

When O
asked O
if O
he O
would O
return O
to O
the O
mountainous O
region O
where O
rebels O
have O
been O
fighting O
Russian S-MISC
troops O
for O
full O
independence O
, O
Penrose S-PERSON
said O
: O
" O
Not O
for O
the O
time O
being O
. O

I O
do O
n't O
think O
it O
's O
safe O
for O
me O
. O

But O
maybe O
in O
the O
future O
, O
depending O
on O
the O
circumstances O
. O
" O

Princess O
Diana S-PERSON
send O
message O
to O
Mother B-PERSON
Teresa E-PERSON
. O

LONDON S-LOC
1996-08-24 O

Britain S-LOC
's O
Princess O
Diana S-PERSON
has O
sent O
a O
message O
to O
seriously O
ill O
Mother B-PERSON
Teresa E-PERSON
, O
the O
nun O
to O
whom O
she O
has O
turned O
several O
times O
for O
spiritual O
guidance O
. O

Diana S-PERSON
's O
office O
said O
on O
Saturday O
the O
princess O
had O
sent O
a O
message O
to O
the O
Nobel B-MISC
Peace I-MISC
Prize-winning E-MISC
missionary O
as O
news O
broke O
this O
week O
of O
her O
battle O
against O
heart O
problems O
and O
malaria O
. O

A O
spokeswoman O
declined O
to O
release O
details O
of O
the O
message O
. O

Diana S-PERSON
first O
met O
the O
Albanian-born S-MISC
missionary O
in O
Rome S-LOC
in O
1992 O
. O

She O
said O
afterwards O
that O
the O
meeting O
had O
fulfilled O
her O
" O
dearest O
wish O
" O
and O
the O
two O
women O
have O
met O
several O
times O
since O
. O

The O
princess O
, O
who O
has O
carved O
out O
a O
major O
role O
for O
herself O
as O
a O
helper O
of O
the O
sick O
and O

, O
is O
said O
to O
have O
turned O
to O
Mother B-PERSON
Teresa E-PERSON
for O
guidance O
as O
her O
marriage O
crumbled O
to O
heir O
to O
the O
British S-MISC
throne O
Prince B-PERSON
Charles E-PERSON
. O

The O

nun O
said O
in O
the O
past O
that O
she O
was O
praying O
for O
the O

, O
whose O
divorce O
is O
expected O
to O
become O
final O
next O
week O
. O

for O

on O
Saturday O

. O

Adventurers O
start O
Canadian S-MISC
wilderness O
race O
. O

PEMBERTON S-LOC
, O
British B-LOC
Columbia E-LOC
1996-08-24 O

About O
350 O
adventurers O
from O
nine O
countries O
set O
out O
on O
Saturday O
to O
climb O
, O

, O
bike O
and O
run O
in O
a O
323-mile O
( O
517-km O
) O
endurance O
race O
through O
the O
Canadian S-MISC
wilderness O
. O

The O
event O
, O
called O
the O
Eco-Challenge S-MISC
, O
is O
part O
of O
a O
growing O
sport O
known O
as O

racing O
in O
which O
competitors O
test O
their O

for O

over O

. O

" O

'm O

forward O
to O

. O

will O
be O
more O

'll O

to O

against O
more O

due O
to O
the O

, O
" O

Michael B-PERSON

, O
a O

. O

The O
Eco-Challenge S-MISC
has O
been O
staged O
twice O
before O
-- O
in O
Utah S-LOC
and O
Maine S-LOC
last O
year O
-- O
and O
is O

on O
similar O

. O

The O
70 O

in O
this O
year O

will O

, O

raft O
, O

ride O
, O

and O

along O
the O

course O
. O

This O
year O
's O
race O
, O
the O
route O
of O
which O
was O
keep O
a O
secret O
until O
Friday O

, O
is O
being O
held O
near O
Pemberton S-LOC
, O
British B-LOC
Columbia E-LOC
, O
about O
100 O
miles O
( O

km O
) O
northeast O
of O

. O

The O

is O
filled O
with O

, O

. O

, O

In O

, O

( O

) O

( O

) O

is O

language O

in O

which O
has O

Prasad B-PERSON

to O

. O

One O
feature O
of O

Java S-MISC
language O
is O
that O
small O
software O
programmes O
, O
known O
as O
" O
applets O
" O
because O

are O

can O

. O

In O

latest O
programmes O
and O
do O

on O

at O

, O
also O
saving O

of O
memory O
and O
storage O
. O

Chris B-PERSON
Zuleeg E-PERSON
, O
a O
veteran O
of O
Apple S-ORG
and O
a O
former O
JavaSoft S-ORG
marketing O
manager O
, O
is O
vice O
president O
of O
marketing O
at O
Internet B-ORG
Startup E-ORG
, O
whose O
Web O
site O
is O
www.internetstartup.com O
. O

Bessemer S-ORG
has O
funded O
numerous O
Internet S-MISC
pioneers O
, O
including O
PSI B-ORG
Net E-ORG
, O
VeriSign S-ORG
and O
Individual S-ORG
. O

GOLF O
- O
MICKELSON S-PERSON
WINS O
FOURTH O
TITLE O
OF O
YEAR O
IN O
AKRON S-LOC
. O

AKRON S-LOC
, O
Ohio S-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Phil B-PERSON
Mickelson E-PERSON
birdied O
two O
of O
the O
last O
three O
holes O
to O
win O
World B-MISC
Series I-MISC
of I-MISC
Golf E-MISC
by O
three O
strokes O
over O
Billy B-PERSON
Mayfair E-PERSON
on O
Sunday O
. O

It O
was O
the O
fourth O
tournament O
title O
this O
year O
for O
Mickelson S-PERSON
, O
who O
shot O
an O
even-par O
70 O
, O
after O
being O
tied O
for O
the O
lead O
with O
Billy B-PERSON
Mayfair E-PERSON
with O
three O
holes O
to O
play O
. O

Along O
with O
Mayfiar S-PERSON
at O
277 O
for O
the O
tournament O
were O
Steve B-PERSON
Stricker E-PERSON
, O
who O
had O
a O
68 O
, O
and O
Duffy B-PERSON
Waldorf E-PERSON
, O
with O
a O
66 O
. O

" O
It O
was O
very O
hard O
to O
sleep O
last O
night O
because O
there O
was O
so O
much O
I O
could O
accomplish O
with O
this O
win O
, O
" O
said O
Mickelson S-PERSON
, O
who O
had O
a O
three-stroke O
lead O
entering O
the O
third O
round O
. O
" O

This O
was O
a O
win O
I O
wanted O
very O
, O
very O
much O
. O
" O

Mickelson S-PERSON
's O
victory O
gave O
him O
a O
10 O
year O
exemption O
to O
the O
PGA B-MISC
Tour E-MISC
. O

The O
$ O
378,000 O
first O
place O
check O
brings O
Mickelson S-PERSON
back O
to O
the O
top O
of O
the O
money O
list O
with O
$ O
1,574,799 O
won O
this O
year O
. O

" O
This O
is O
a O
major O
championship O
golf O
course O
, O
and O
for O
me O
to O
perform O
well O
on O
this O
style O
of O
course O
is O
a O
big O
step O
up O
for O
me O
in O
my O
career O
and O
my O
performance O
in O
future O
majors O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

Mickelson S-PERSON
three-stroke O
lead O
was O
cut O
to O
two O
when O
Mayfair S-PERSON
birdied O
the O
course O
's O
only O
easy O
hole O
, O
the O
par O
five O
second O
hole O
, O
while O
Mickelson S-PERSON
three-putted O
for O
par O
from O
25 O
feet O
. O

On O
the O
back O
nine O
Mickelson S-PERSON
began O
driving O
erratically O
, O
and O
poor O
tee O
shots O
resulted O
in O
bogeys O
on O
the O
, O
eighth O
, O
12th O
and O
13th O
holes O
, O
bringing O
Mickelson S-PERSON
back O
to O
four O
under O
par O
, O
tied O
with O
Mayfair S-PERSON
, O
who O
had O
parred O
14 O
straight O
holes O
after O
the O
birdie O
on O
no.2 O
. O

Mickelson S-PERSON
then O
set O
up O
a O
tap O
in O
birdie O
on O
the O
16th O
, O
sending O
a O
wedge O
shot O
to O
18 O
inches O
. O

He O
had O
another O
birdie O
on O
the O
17th O
, O
where O
he O
his O
a O
6-iron O
to O
six O
feet O
. O

Mayfair S-PERSON
bogeyed O
the O
17th O
, O
missing O
a O
five O
foot O
par O
putt O
, O
and O
dropped O
from O
solo O
second O
place O
to O
a O
three O
way O
tie O
for O
second O
. O

It O
was O
the O
second O
successive O
year O
in O
which O
Mayfair S-PERSON
has O
finished O
runner O
up O
in O
this O
tournament O
. O

He O
lost O
to O
Greg B-PERSON
Norman E-PERSON
in O
sudden O
death O
last O
year O
. O

The O
defending O
champion O
was O
in O
contention O
, O
two O
behind O
Mickelson S-PERSON
for O
much O
of O
the O
day O
, O
until O
he O
bogeyed O
the O
13th O
and O
14th O
holes O
. O

- O

. O

SUGO S-LOC
, O
Japan S-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Teenager O

the O

, O

, O
last O

. O

past O

CRICKET O
- O
RUN-OUT O
GIVES O
LEWIS S-PERSON
AND O
ENGLAND S-LOC
SLIM O
SATISFACTION O
. O

LONDON S-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Chris B-PERSON
Lewis E-PERSON
did O
his O
best O
to O
forget O
his O
controversial O
omission O
from O
the O
England S-LOC
one-day O
squad O
on O
Sunday O
but O
could O
not O
prevent O
Pakistan S-LOC
reasserting O
their O
dominance O
in O
the O
final O
test O
at O
The B-LOC
Oval E-LOC
. O

A O
super O
piece O
of O
fielding O
by O
Lewis S-PERSON
, O
dropped O
as O
a O
disciplinary O
measure O
after O
arriving O
only O
35 O
minutes O
before O
the O
start O
on O
the O
fourth O
morning O
, O
provided O
the O
only O
bright O
spot O
for O
England S-LOC
as O
the O
touring O
team O
batted O
on O
to O
reach O
413 O
for O
five O
at O
the O
interval O
, O
a O
lead O
of O
87 O
. O

The O
solitary O
wicket O
to O
fall O
was O
Asif B-PERSON
Mujtaba E-PERSON
, O
run O
out O
for O
13 O
attempting O
a O
second O
run O
to O
third O
man O
where O
Lewis S-PERSON
was O
lurking O
with O
a O
point O
to O
prove O
. O

There O
seemed O
scant O
danger O
until O
the O
Surrey S-ORG
player O
swooped O
on O
to O
the O
ball O
and O
returned O
off O
balance O
to O
county O
team O
mate O
Alec B-PERSON
Stewart E-PERSON
who O
whipped O
off O
the O
bails O
. O

Lewis S-PERSON
, O
though O
, O
could O
not O
make O
similar O
waves O
with O
the O
ball O
as O
Salim B-PERSON
Malik E-PERSON
and O
Wasim B-PERSON
Akram E-PERSON
batted O
through O
the O
rest O
of O
the O
session O
with O
few O
alarms O
. O

Wasim S-PERSON
rattled O
along O
to O
30 O
not O
out O
, O
outscoring O
his O
partner O
who O
was O
unbeaten O
on O
24 O
at O
the O
break O
, O
although O
the O
weather O
was O
again O
threatening O
to O
play O
the O
dominant O
role O
. O

Rain O
arrived O
just O
as O
the O
players O
left O
the O
field O
for O
lunch O
, O
forcing O
the O
ground-staff O
into O
action O
yet O
again O
. O

for O
over O

BASEBALL O
- O
ORIOLES S-ORG
SNEAK O
PAST O
ANGELS S-ORG
. O

BALTIMORE S-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Rafael B-PERSON
Palmeiro E-PERSON
's O
two-out O
single O
in O
the O
sixth O
inning O
scored O
Roberto B-PERSON
Alomar E-PERSON
with O
the O
go-ahead O
run O
as O
the O
Baltimore B-ORG
Orioles E-ORG
rallied O
past O
the O
California B-ORG
Angels E-ORG
5-4 O
and O
took O
over O
the O
American B-MISC
League E-MISC
's O
wild-card O
berth O
on O
Saturday O
. O

The O
Orioles S-ORG
trailed O
4-3 O
when O
pinch-hitter O
Mike B-PERSON
Devereaux E-PERSON
led O
off O
the O
sixth O
with O
a O
triple O
against O
reliever O
Kyle B-PERSON
Abbott E-PERSON
( O
0-1 O
) O
and O
scored O
the O
tying O
run O
on O
Alomar S-PERSON
's O
single O
. O

After O
Brady B-PERSON
Anderson E-PERSON
sacrificed O
, O
Palmeiro S-PERSON
hit O
the O
first O
pitch O
into O
right O
field O
for O
a O
single O
, O
scoring O
Alomar S-PERSON
. O

In O
Boston S-LOC
, O

- O

BEAT O

4-1 O

AWAY O
FROM O
AJAX S-ORG
. O

AMSTERDAM S-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Belgian S-MISC
international O
Luc B-PERSON
Nilis E-PERSON
scored O
twice O
on O
Sunday O
as O
PSV B-ORG
Eindhoven E-ORG
came O
from O
behind O
to O
beat O
Groningen S-ORG
4-1 O
in O

. O

and O
Vitesse B-ORG

are O

Moslem S-MISC

MATUZICI S-LOC
, O

of O

as O

to O

, O

of O

. O

, O

. O

Corporate O
America S-LOC
taking O
new O
view O
on O
compensation O
. O

Anne B-PERSON
Murray E-PERSON

NEW B-LOC
YORK E-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Corporate O
America S-LOC
is O
planning O
major O
changes O
in O
employee O
compensation O
in O
the O
next O
few O
years O
, O
according O
to O
a O
recent O
study O
. O

What O
it O
comes O
down O
to O
is O
this O
: O
If O
you O
're O
highly O
skilled O
, O
you O
'll O
benefit O
nicely O
. O

But O
if O
you O
're O
not O
and O
cannot O
contribute O
to O
your O
employer O
's O
goals O
, O
you O
'll O
be O
paid O
less O
. O

The O
survey O
, O
conducted O
in O
late O
1995 O
and O
the O
early O
part O
of O
this O
year O
by O
management O
consulting O
firm O
Towers B-ORG
Perrin E-ORG
, O
showed O
that O
the O
focus O
will O
be O
on O
an O
employee O
's O
overall O
value O
to O
the O
company O
's O
bottom O
line O
-- O
rather O
than O
how O
well O
an O
employee O
performs O
a O
specific O
task O
. O

Presently O
, O
for O
example O
, O
if O
an O
accountant O
's O
job O
involves O
doing O
five O
specific O
tasks O
, O
he O
or O
she O
can O
expect O
a O
certain O
salary O
, O
said O
Sandra B-PERSON
O'Neal E-PERSON
, O
a O
Towers B-ORG
Perrin E-ORG
principal O
. O

In O
the O
future O
, O
the O
accountant O
will O
be O
evaluated O
solely O
on O
" O
knowledge O
, O
skill O
and O
abilities O
, O
" O
she O
said O
. O

In O
addition O
to O
using O
accounting O
skills O
, O
the O
accountant O
will O
also O
have O
to O
be O
creative O
, O
work O
well O
in O
a O
team O
, O
be O
sensitive O
to O
customer O
needs O
and O
set O
productivity O
goals O
. O

" O
The O
good O
news O
is O
, O
if O
you O
're O
highly O
skilled O
and O
have O
many O
abilities O
, O
you O
'll O
be O
paid O
more O
, O
" O
said O
O'Neal S-PERSON
. O

" O
The O
bad O
news O
is O
, O
if O
you O
're O
not O
skilled O
and O
ca O
n't O
contribute O
to O
a O
team O
, O
to O
customer O
service O
and O
the O
organisation O
's O
goals O
, O
you O
'll O
be O
paid O
less O
. O
" O

Of O
the O
750 O
mid-to-large O
size O
corporations O
surveyed O
, O
81 O
percent O
had O
undergone O
a O
major O
restructuring O
in O
the O
last O
three O
years O
, O
and O
more O
than O
two-thirds O
reported O
that O
productivity O
and O
profits O
were O
up O
as O
result O
. O

Next O
on O
the O
agenda O
for O
these O
firms O
is O
developing O
a O
new O
compensation O
structure O
, O
and O
78 O
percent O
report O
that O
they O
are O
considering O
a O
new O
, O
skills-based O
plan O
for O
both O
management O
and O
non-management O
employees O
. O

This O
coming O
shift O
, O
O'Neal S-PERSON
said O
, O
" O
is O
not O
just O
isolated O
or O
a O
fad O
. O

It O
's O
an O
inexorable O
change O
. O
" O

After O
World B-MISC
War I-MISC
II E-MISC
, O
corporations O
adopted O
a O
" O
military O
model O
" O
creating O
hierarchical O
organisations O
where O
" O
the O
concept O
of O
defined O
tasks O
worked O
great O
, O
" O
she O
said O
. O

But O
as O
the O
economy O
became O
global O
, O
customers O
were O
more O
demanding O
and O
problems O
became O
more O
complex O
. O

" O
Multi-layers O
kept O
management O
at O
a O
distance O
from O
its O
customers O
, O
" O
O'Neal S-PERSON
said O
. O

Now O
organisations O
must O
change O
to O
stay O
competitive O
. O

O'Neal S-PERSON
says O
firms O
will O
place O
a O
greater O
emphasis O
on O
teams O
and O
team O
performance O
in O
giving O
raises O
. O

If O
your O
team O
does O
well O
, O
you O
'll O
do O
well O
. O

If O
it O
does O
n't O
do O
well O
, O
do O
n't O
expect O
a O
raise O
. O

Is O
this O
fair O
to O
an O
employee O
who O
can O
go O
the O
distance O
but O
is O
on O
a O
team O
that O
ca O
n't O
keep O
up O
? O

" O
That O
's O
an O
important O
question O
we O
used O
to O
ask O
a O
lot O
, O
" O
said O
O'Neal S-PERSON
. O
" O

It O
's O
not O
a O
question O
we O
ask O
any O
more O
. O

The O
more O
important O
question O
is O
-- O
' O
Do O
we O
have O
results O
? O
' O

" O

To O
get O
those O
results O
, O
27 O
percent O
of O
the O
companies O
surveyed O
plan O
to O
eliminate O
base O
pay O
increases O
in O
favour O
of O
cash O
bonuses O
and O
incentives O
, O
such O
as O
employee O
and O
team O
award O
programmes O
and O
education O
. O

Companies O
that O
can O
change O
their O
culture O
and O
view O
employees O
as O
business O
partners O
will O
do O
well O
, O
O'Neal S-PERSON
said O
. O

For O
example O
, O
the O
survey O
rated O
some O
participants O
in O
the O
survey O
as O
" O
high-performing O
" O
companies O
, O
based O
on O
their O
return O
on O
equity O
above O
16 O
percent O
. O

Those O
companies O
also O
said O
they O
already O
offer O
employees O
variable O
pay O
and O
business O
education O
, O
give O
their O
managers O
more O
control O
over O
pay O
decisions O
and O
celebrate O
employee O
and O
team O
success O
. O

" O
They O
respect O
employees O
more O
, O
they O
trust O
employees O
more O
and O
they O
value O
their O
employees O
more O
, O
" O
O'Neal S-PERSON
said O
. O

" O
The O
key O
to O
success O
at O
high-performance O
companies O
is O
engaging O
employees O
in O
a O
business O
partnership O
. O

It O
will O
improve O
a O
company O
's O
bottom O
line O
. O
" O

Medical I-ORG
Inc. E-ORG
said O
Monday O

buy O

Inc. E-ORG
, O
a O
former O
Eli B-ORG

& I-ORG

. O

unit O
, O
for O
about O

400 O

in O

, O

one O
of O
the O

's O
largest O

of O

infusion O
therapy O
products O
. O

. O

Advanced B-ORG
Medical E-ORG
, O

, O

of O

. O

It O

. O

San B-MISC
Diego-based E-MISC
IVAC S-ORG
is O
a O

systems O
and O

. O

- O

IN O

FOR O
HISTORIC O
VICTORY O
. O

Mark B-PERSON
Gleeson E-PERSON

JOHANNESBURG S-LOC
1996-08-26 O

The O
tiny O
islands O
of O
the O
Seychelles S-LOC
failed O
to O
make O
soccer O
history O
at O
the O
weekend O
when O
they O
bowed O
out O
of O
the O
preliminary O
rounds O
of O
the O
African B-MISC
Nations I-MISC
Cup E-MISC
. O

Trailing O
fellow O
Indian B-LOC
Ocean E-LOC
islanders O
Mauritius S-LOC
1-0 O
from O
the O
first O
leg O
, O
they O
were O
held O
to O
a O
1-1 O
draw O
at O
home O
on O
Saturday O
despite O
playing O
against O
10 O
men O
for O
most O
of O
the O
match O
. O

The O
2-1 O
aggregate O
took O
Mauritius S-LOC
into O
the O
group O
phase O
of O
the O
qualifiers O
for O
the O
1998 O
finals O
, O
and O
kept O
up O
the O
Seychelles S-LOC
' O
record O
of O
never O
having O
won O
an O
official O
match O
in O
their O
10 O
years O
of O
FIFA S-ORG
membership O
. O

The O
Seychelles S-LOC
must O
have O
thought O
they O
were O
on O
course O
for O
a O
historic O
breakthrough O
when O
Mauritian S-MISC
midfielder O
Andre B-PERSON
Caboche E-PERSON
was O
sent O
off O
for O
a O
crude O
tackle O
in O
the O
19th O
minute O
. O

But O
the O
visitors O
responded O
to O
the O
setback O
immediately O
-- O
veteran O
striker O
Ashley B-PERSON
Mocude E-PERSON
scoring O
a O
minute O
later O
to O
give O
them O
a O
two-goal O
aggregate O
lead O
. O

Although O
Danny B-PERSON
Rose E-PERSON
's O
50th-minute O
equaliser O
gave O
the O
Seychellois S-MISC
renewed O
hope O
they O
could O
not O
find O
the O
net O
again O
and O
were O
eliminated O
. O

Mauritius S-LOC
now O
play O
in O
group O
seven O
of O
the O
qualifiers O
against O
Malawi S-LOC
, O
Mozambique S-LOC
and O
favourites O
Zambia S-LOC
. O

Namibia S-LOC
, O
who O
drew O
0-0 O
with O
Botswana S-LOC
in O
their O
first O
leg O
, O
won O
the O
second O
leg O
in O
Windhoek S-LOC
6-0 O
to O
stretch O
their O
unbeaten O
run O
to O
eight O
matches O
and O
continue O
their O
remarkable O
progress O
on O
the O
African S-MISC
soccer O
stage O
. O

They O
now O
play O
in O
group O
five O
with O
Cameroon S-LOC
, O
Gabon S-LOC
and O
Kenya S-LOC
. O

German-based O
striker O
Bachirou B-PERSON
Salou E-PERSON
returned O
home O
to O
Togo S-LOC
to O
score O
the O
decisive O
only O
goal O
of O
their O
tie O
against O
Congo S-LOC
. O

Salou S-PERSON
, O
who O
plays O
for O
MSV B-ORG
Duisburg E-ORG
in O
the O
Bundesliga S-MISC
, O
scored O
in O
the O

minute O
of O
Sunday O
's O
match O
in O

for O
a O
1-0 O
aggregate O
win O
which O
takes O
his O
side O
into O
group O
six O
, O
where O
they O
will O
meet O
Liberia S-LOC
, O
Tanzania S-LOC
and O
Zaire S-LOC
. O

Ethiopia S-LOC
needed O
a O

in O

. O

the O

. O

SWIMMING O
- O
POPOV S-PERSON
IN O
`SERIOUS O
CONDITION O
' O
AFTER O
STABBING O
. O

MOSCOW S-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Russian S-MISC
double O
Olympic S-MISC
swimming O
champion O
Alexander B-PERSON
Popov E-PERSON
was O
in O
a O
serious O
condition O
on O
Monday O
after O
being O
stabbed O
on O
a O
Moscow S-LOC
street O
. O

A O
doctor O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
say O
whether O
Popov S-PERSON
, O
the O
only O
man O
to O
retain O
the O
Olympic S-MISC
50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
titles O
, O
would O
return O
to O
top-level O
sport O
. O

" O
His O
condition O
is O
serious O
, O
" O
said O
Rimma B-PERSON
Maslova E-PERSON
, O
deputy O
chief O
doctor O
of O
Hospital B-LOC
No I-LOC
31 E-LOC
in O
the O
Russian S-MISC
capital O
. O
" O

But O
he O
is O
conscious O
and O
is O
talking O
and O
smiling O
. O
" O

Maslova S-PERSON
told O
Reuters S-ORG
she O
was O
not O
an O
expert O
in O
sports O
medicine O
, O
but O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
judge O
Popov S-PERSON
's O
chances O
of O
returning O
to O
competitive O
swimming O
. O

Popov S-PERSON
, O
who O
won O
gold O
in O
the O
50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
at O
the O
recent O
Atlanta B-MISC
Olympics E-MISC
, O
was O
stabbed O
in O
the O
abdomen O
late O
on O
Saturday O
after O
an O
argument O
with O
a O
group O
of O
roadside O
watermelon O
sellers O
in O
south-west O
Moscow S-LOC
. O

Maslova S-PERSON
said O
the O
wound O
had O
affected O
a O
lung O
and O
a O
kidney O
. O

Doctors O
operated O
on O
Popov S-PERSON
, O
24 O
, O
for O
three O
hours O
. O

Popov S-PERSON
told O
NTV S-ORG
television O
on O
Sunday O
he O
was O
in O
no O
danger O
and O
promised O
he O
would O
be O
back O
in O
the O
pool O
shortly O
. O
" O

There O
's O
no O
need O
to O
worry O
. O

We O
're O
going O
to O
be O
walking O
soon O
-- O
and O
swimming O
, O
" O
he O
insisted O
cheerfully O
from O
his O
bed O
in O
the O
intensive O
care O
unit O
. O

Interfax S-ORG
news O
agency O
said O
police O
had O
detained O
one O
of O
the O
attackers O
. O

It O
said O
the O
row O
started O
when O
Popov S-PERSON
and O
a O
group O
of O
his O
friends O
were O
returning O
from O
a O
party O
. O

Vitaly B-PERSON
Smirnov E-PERSON
, O
president O
of O
the O
Russian B-MISC
National I-MISC
Olympic I-MISC
Committee E-MISC
, O
said O
President O
Boris B-PERSON
Yeltsin E-PERSON
had O
given O
the O
swimmer O
Russia S-LOC
's O
top O
award O
for O
his O
Olympic S-MISC
performance O
. O
" O

I O
am O
not O
a O
doctor O
but O
I O
think O
he O
is O
doing O
all O
right O
, O
" O

Smirnov S-PERSON
. O

said O

to O

Lamonts B-ORG
Apparel E-ORG
files O
reorganization O
plan O
. O

[ O
CORRECTED O
18:00 O
GMT S-MISC
] O

KIRKLAND S-LOC
, O
Wash S-LOC
. O

1996-08-26 O

Lamonts B-ORG
Apparel I-ORG
Inc E-ORG
, O
an O
operator O
of O
42 O
family O
apparel O
stores O
in O
six O
northwestern O
states O
, O
said O
it O
has O
filed O
a O
reorganization O
plan O
in O
bankruptcy O
court O
in O
Seattle S-LOC
. O

( O
Corrects O
to O
make O
clear O
a O
reorganization O
plan O
has O
been O
filed O
) O
. O

The O
reorganization O
plan O
calls O
for O
all O
secured O
claims O
to O
be O
paid O
in O
full O
. O

Unsecured O
claims O
, O
including O
those O
of O
company O
bondholders O
, O
will O
be O
satisfied O
by O
issuing O
new O
common O
stock O
and O
warrants O
. O

Unsecured O
claims O
are O
estimated O
at O
about O
$ O
90 O
million O
. O

Lamonts S-ORG
said O
it O
plans O
to O
issue O
9 O
million O
shares O
of O
new O
common O
stock O
. O

Of O
that O
amount O
, O
4.05 O
million O
and O
5.67 O
million O
shares O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
the O
company O
's O
trade O
creditors O
. O

Between O
4.75 O
and O
3.13 O
million O
shares O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
bondholders O
and O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
and O
200,000 O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
existing O
shareholders O
in O
exchange O
for O
all O
existing O
stock O
of O
the O
company O
. O

Bondholders O
and O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
will O
receive O
warrants O
four O
about O
2.2 O
million O
shares O
when O
the O
company O
's O
market O
capitalization O
reaches O
$ O
20 O
million O
. O

Bondholders O
, O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
, O
and O
existing O
shareholders O
also O
will O
receive O
warrants O
entitling O
them O
to O
roughly O
800,000 O
shares O
when O
the O
company O
's O
market O
capitalization O
reaches O
$ O
25 O
million O
. O

Management O
will O

ups O

. O

percent O

FEATURE O
- O
" O
Eco O
terrorists O
" O
target O
UK S-LOC
builders O
. O

Edna B-PERSON
Fernandes E-PERSON

LONDON S-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Ecological O
warfare O
has O
broken O
out O
across O
the O
British S-MISC
construction O
industry O
, O
striking O
some O
of O
the O
biggest O
corporates O
as O
activists O
give O
up O
peaceful O
protests O
and O
seek O
to O
hit O
builders O
where O
it O
hurts O
-- O
their O
profit O
margins O
. O

Described O
by O
one O
British S-MISC
company O
as O
" O
eco-terrorism O
" O
, O
it O
is O
seen O
as O
the O
new O
business O
risk O
of O
the O
1990s O
. O

Famous O
names O
like O
Tarmac B-ORG
Plc E-ORG
, O
Costain B-ORG
Group I-ORG
Plc E-ORG
and O
ARC S-ORG
, O
a O

of O

Plc E-ORG
, O
have O
all O
been O
targeted O
. O

Activist O
groups O
are O
no O
longer O
seen O
by O
British S-MISC
firms O
as O
a O
harmless O
, O
badly O

of O

and O

. O

" O

only O

to O

" O

. O

They O

a O

OLAZABAL S-PERSON
. O

NORTHAMPTON S-LOC
, O
England S-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Seve B-PERSON
Ballesteros E-PERSON
and O
Colin B-PERSON
Montgomerie E-PERSON
are O
divided O
on O
whether O
Jose B-PERSON
Maria I-PERSON
Olazabal E-PERSON
should O
be O
allowed O
to O
return O
to O
the O
European B-MISC
PGA I-MISC
Tour E-MISC
using O
a O
motorised O
cart O
to O
transport O
him O
around O
the O
course O
. O

The O
Spaniard S-MISC
has O
not O
played O
for O
nearly O
a O
year O
because O
of O
rheumatoid O
arthritis O
in O
both O
his O
feet O
, O
and O
organisers O
of O
a O

event O
to O
be O
staged O
in O

, O

from O
October O
17 O
to O
20 O
have O
been O
asked O
to O
provide O
him O
with O
a O
buggy O
. O

" O
If O
the O
( O
Tour S-MISC
's O
tournament O
) O
committee O
decides O
to O
change O
the O
rule O
I O
would O
not O
be O
against O
it O
, O
" O
said O
Ballesteros S-PERSON
, O
Olazabal S-PERSON
's O

and O
Ryder B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
captain O
. O

But O
commitee O
member O
Montgomerie S-PERSON
said O
it O
could O
set O
an O
unhelpful O
precedent O
. O
" O

I O
know O
Olly S-PERSON
's O
situation O
is O
very O
unfortunate O
, O
but O
I O
do O
n't O
think O
we O
can O
start O
giving O

, O
" O
he O
said O
. O
" O

You O
've O
got O
to O
have O
a O

for O
everybody O
and O
I O
do O
n't O
think O
it O
's O

. O
" O

The O

of O

is O
generally O

in O
the O
professional O
game O
, O
and O

1996-08-27 O

. O

1996-08-27 O

Swiss S-MISC
league O
leaders O

said O
on O
Tuesday O
they O
would O
appeal O
against O
a O

on O

for O

a O

. O

, O

Swiss S-MISC
francs O
( O
$ O
8,400 O
) O
, O

with O

in O

. O

, O

Former O
Argentine S-MISC
benevolent O

Alejandro B-PERSON
Lanusse E-PERSON
dies O
. O

BUENOS B-LOC
AIRES E-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Alejandro B-PERSON
Lanusse E-PERSON
, O
the O
former O
dictator O
who O
ruled O
Argentina S-LOC
for O
two O
years O
, O
died O
at O
age O
78 O
on O
Monday O
. O

Lanusse S-PERSON
died O
after O
being O
brought O
to O
a O
hospital O
a O
week O
ago O
following O
a O
fall O
at O
home O
that O
resulted O
in O
a O
blood O
clot O
in O
the O
brain O
. O

He O
was O
operated O
on O
earlier O
in O
the O
week O
but O
failed O
to O
recover O
from O
surgery O
. O

The O
former O
dictator O
, O
who O
ruled O
from O
1971 O
to O
1973 O
, O
was O
best O
known O
for O
allowing O
Juan B-PERSON
Domingo I-PERSON
Peron E-PERSON
, O
Argentina S-LOC
's O
famed O
populist O
leader O
, O
to O
return O
to O
Argentina S-LOC
after O
17 O
years O
of O
forced O
exile O
. O

Lanusse S-PERSON
took O
over O
the O
leadership O
of O
the O
country O
after O
five O
years O
of O
dictatorship O
. O

But O
unlike O
his O
two O
predecessors O
, O
Juan B-PERSON
Carlos E-PERSON
Ongania O
and O
Marcelo B-PERSON
Levingston E-PERSON
, O
who O
ruled O
Argentina S-LOC
with O
an O
iron O
hand O
, O
Lanusse S-PERSON
steered O
the O
country O
toward O
democracy O
. O

That O
resulted O
in O
general O
elections O
in O
March O
1973 O
when O
the O
Peronists S-ORG
led O
by O
Hector B-PERSON
Campora E-PERSON
and O
Vicente B-PERSON
Solano I-PERSON
Lima E-PERSON
returned O
to O
power O
. O

Lanusse S-PERSON
was O
a O
candidate O
in O
the O
election O
but O
failed O
to O
defeat O
his O
old O
adversories O
and O
never O
returned O
to O
public O
office O
. O

He O
was O
imprisoned O
for O
four O
years O
in O
1951 O
for O
taking O
part O
in O
a O
coup O
attempt O
to O
overthrow O
Peron S-PERSON
led O
by O
General O
Benjamin B-PERSON
Menendez E-PERSON
. O

Lanusse S-PERSON
's O
rule O
saw O
the O
gradual O
rise O
of O
left-wing O
activism O
which O
culminated O
in O
another O
period O
of O
brutal O
Argentine S-MISC
dictatorship O
from O
1976 O
to O
1983 O
, O
during O
which O
the O
military O
launched O
its O
" O
dirty O
war O
" O
that O
resulted O
in O
10,000 O
missing O
people O
. O

In O
his O
autobiography O
published O
in O
1990 O
, O
Lanusse S-PERSON
described O
himself O
as O
a O
military O
man O
with O
" O

1996-08-27 O

for O

remained O

and O

continued O
to O
move O
higher O
, O
millfeed O
dealers O
said O
. O

and O

for O

continued O
to O

millfeed O
prices O
in O

. O

sold O
much O
of O

production O
through O
September O

little O
available O
for O
prompt O
shipment O
. O

sources O
said O
feed O
mixer O
demand O
was O
keeping O
pace O
with O

production O
and O

prices O
higher O
. O

sources O
said O

there O
at O

at O
$ O

, O

at O

a O

. O

continued O
to O

for O

. O

into O

said O

The B-MISC

between O

, O

. O

Sharma E-PERSON

KATHMANDU S-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Nepal S-LOC
's O
centre-right O
coalition O
government O
has O
offered O
to O
meet O
the O
country O
's O
hardline O
Maoist S-MISC
communists O
for O
talks O
in O
a O
bid O
to O
end O
an O
insurgency O
in O
Nepal S-LOC
's O
western O
districts O
, O
officials O
said O
on O
Tuesday O
. O

The O
Maoists S-MISC
oppose O
multi-party O
democracy O
and O
want O
to O
establish O
a O
communist O
state O
. O

But O

government O
said O
the O

must O
give O
up O

before O
it O

with O
them O
. O

" O

( O

) O

first O

up O
their O
violent O
activities O
, O
" O
Home O
( O
Interior O
) O
Minister O
Khum B-PERSON
Bahadur I-PERSON
Khadga E-PERSON
said O
. O

About O
54 O
people O
have O
died O
in O
Maoist S-MISC
insurgent O
activity O
and O
in O
police O
action O
against O
them O
since O
February O
, O
officials O
said O
. O

Nepali S-MISC
opposition O
parties O
have O
accused O
the O
police O
of O
having O
killed O
more O
people O
than O
the O
insurgents O
. O

Some O
human O
rights O
groups O
have O
criticised O
the O
government O
's O
handling O
of O
the O
situation O
. O

In O
a O

on O
Tuesday O
, O

challenged O
the O
Maoist S-MISC
communists O
to O
" O

people O
's O

" O
and O
win O

to O

. O

Monday O

had O
offered O
to O
talk O
to O
leaders O
of O

People I-ORG
's I-ORG
Front I-ORG

( O
Bhattarai S-ORG
) O
, O
the O
Maoist S-MISC
faction O
which O
leads O
the O
insurgency O
. O

" O

is O

to O

of O

representatives O
who O
want O
to O

in O
peaceful O

, O
" O

said O
. O

six O

ago O
, O

means O

will O

PERTH S-LOC
, O

Peiris E-PERSON
painted O

( O

) O

of O

" O

" O

. O

SEC S-ORG
adopts O
rules O
to O
improve O
investor O
access O
to O
best O
stock O
prices O
. O

WASHINGTON S-LOC
1996-08-28 O

The O
Securities B-ORG
and I-ORG
Exchange I-ORG
Commission E-ORG
Wednesday O
approved O
rules O
designed O
to O
give O
stock O
market O
investors O
a O
better O
chance O
at O
getting O
the O
best O
price O
available O
for O
their O
orders O
. O

The O
so-called O
order O
handling O
rules O
, O
which O
were O
proposed O
last O
September O
, O
were O
approved O
in O
a O
4-0 O
vote O
. O

The O
new O
rules O
will O
require O
specialists O
at O
stock O
exchanges O
and O
market O
makers O
on O
Nasdaq S-MISC
to O
allow O
customers O
to O
view O
price O
quotes O
from O
other O
electronic O
trading O
systems O
that O
may O
not O
be O
readily O
available O
to O
them O
. O

The O
rules O
will O
also O
require O
that O
customer O
limit O
orders O
be O
displayed O
with O
prices O
better O
than O
those O
available O
in O
quotes O
publicly O
available O
at O
the O
time O
. O

Specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
are O
companies O
or O
individuals O
recognised O
as O
qualified O
to O
maintain O
an O
orderly O
market O
in O
a O
stock O
. O

In O
a O
limit O
order O
, O
investors O
specify O
the O
price O
at O
which O
they O
are O
willing O
to O
buy O
or O
sell O
, O
as O
opposed O
to O
a O
market O
order O
executed O
at O
prevailing O
prices O
. O

" O
These O
rules O
are O
intended O
to O
empower O
all O
investors O
, O
by O
allowing O
their O
orders O
to O
compete O
on O
a O
level O
playing O
field O
, O
and O
by O
providing O
the O
disclosure O
they O
need O
to O
make O
informed O
decisions O
, O
" O
said O
SEC S-ORG
Chairman O
Arthur B-PERSON
Levitt E-PERSON
. O

The O
SEC S-ORG
's O
goal O
, O
he O
added O
, O
was O
to O
create O
" O
one O
system O
where O
one O
price O
could O
be O
available O
to O
everybody O
. O
" O

The O
director O
of O
the O
SEC S-ORG
's O
division O
of O
market O
regulation O
, O
Richard B-PERSON
Lindsey E-PERSON
, O
said O
Wall B-LOC
Street E-LOC
firms O
will O
probably O
need O
to O
spend O
about O
$ O
7 O
million O
to O
carry O
out O
the O
improvements O
called O
for O
by O
the O
new O
rules O
. O

In O
proposing O
the O
rules O
last O
year O
, O
the O
SEC S-ORG
noted O
that O
while O
technology O
has O
improved O
, O
commonplace O
practices O
still O
existed O
that O
worked O
against O
investors O
' O
best O
interests O
. O

It O
noted O
that O
customers O
whose O
orders O
were O
not O
displayed O
lost O
the O
chance O
of O
getting O
the O
best O
possible O
price O
available O
in O
the O
market O
. O

It O
also O
cited O
the O
potential O
problem O
of O
a O
two-tiered O
market O
in O
which O
market O
makers O
quote O
one O
price O
to O
public O
investors O
while O
quoting O
better O
prices O
in O
private O
systems O
, O
thus O
robbing O
investors O
without O
access O
to O
" O
hidden O
" O
quotes O
the O
benefit O
of O
the O
best O
available O
prices O
. O

Earlier O
this O
month O
, O
the O
SEC S-ORG
settled O
charges O
of O
alleged O
malpractices O
on O
Nasdaq S-MISC
when O
the O
parent O
of O
the O
Nasdaq S-MISC
market O
, O
the O
National B-ORG
Association I-ORG
of I-ORG
Securities I-ORG
Dealers E-ORG
, O
agreed O
to O
spend O
$ O
100 O
million O
over O
five O
years O
to O
upgrade O
its O
oversight O
of O
brokers O
' O
trading O
practices O
. O

The O
SEC S-ORG
dropped O
a O
third O
proposal O
that O
would O
have O
allowed O
investors O
with O
market O
orders O
to O
trade O
at O
a O
better O
price O
if O
there O
were O
shifts O
in O
prices O
before O
their O
orders O
were O
executed O
. O

The O
agency O
said O
it O
would O
monitor O
effects O
of O
the O
two O
new O
rules O
before O
considering O
the O
" O
price O
improvement O
" O
proposal O
again O
. O

The O
agency O
also O
proposed O
rule O
changes O
that O
would O
require O
continuous O
" O
bid O
" O
and O
" O
ask O
" O
quotations O
from O
exchange O
specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
who O
trade O
more O
than O
1 O
percent O
of O
a O
stock O
during O
any O
quarter O
on O
Nasdaq S-MISC
. O

The O
SEC S-ORG
's O
limit O
order O
display O
rule O
will O
mean O
a O
major O
change O
for O
Nasdaq S-MISC
, O
where O
such O

have O
never O
been O
displayed O
. O

The O

of O

, O
Alfred B-PERSON

, O

to O

' O

, O

. O

Finn E-PERSON

- O

NEW B-LOC
YORK E-LOC
1996-08-27 O

, O

JORNAL B-ORG
DE I-ORG
ANGOLA E-ORG

- O
Princeton B-PERSON
Lyman E-PERSON
, O
the O
U.S. S-LOC
Under-Secretary O
of O
State O
for O
International O
Organisations O
, O
will O
on O
Wednesday O
continue O
his O
work O
in O
Angola S-LOC
visiting O
Bailundo S-LOC
, O
where O
he O
should O
be O
received O
by O
Jonas B-PERSON
Savimbi E-PERSON
, O
leader O
of O
Unita S-ORG
. O

On O
Tuesday O
Lyman S-PERSON
participated O
in O
a O
meeting O
of O
a O
joint-commission O
where O
he O
considered O
that O
the O
Angolan S-MISC
politicians O
should O
advance O
faster O
and O
find O
a O
way O
to O
cooperate O
. O

In O
his O
opinion O
the O
quartering O
of O

The O

on O

lowered O

for O

's O

, O

, O

from O

1 O
, O

, O

reduced O
as O
much O
as O
possible O

still O

with O

a O

for O
the O

of I-ORG

said O
. O

The O

during O

is O

by O
three O

to O
94 O
, O
while O

" O

. O
" O

" O

billion O

. O

WHEAT--Rains O
boost O

HRW O
planting O

. O

Greg B-PERSON

KANSAS B-LOC
CITY E-LOC
, O
Mo S-LOC
. O

1996-08-28 O

Above-normal O
summer O
rainfall O
in O
the O
U.S. S-LOC
High B-LOC
Plains E-LOC
has O
produced O
near-ideal O
conditions O
for O
planting O
the O
1997 O
hard O
red O
winter O
wheat O
crop O
, O
analysts O
said O
Wednesday O
. O

From O
central O
Texas S-LOC
north O
to O
Kansas S-LOC
, O
rains O
throughout O
July O
and O
August O
have O
relieved O
most O
of O
the O
drought O
conditions O
that O
plagued O
the O
region O
earlier O
this O
year O
. O

" O
Our O
moisture O
situation O
is O
excellent O
, O
especially O
for O
fall O
planting O
of O
winter O
wheat O
, O
" O
said O

. O

" O

" O

Evelyn B-PERSON

Burundi S-LOC

million O

of O

( O

) O
, O

a O

. O

, O
" O

. O

" O

1994/95 O

, O
" O

. O

- O
Sri B-LOC

, O

. O

Spanish S-MISC
tomato O
warriors O
paint O
the O
town O
red O
. O

BUNOL S-LOC
, O
Spain S-LOC
1996-08-28 O

Revellers O
painted O
the O
town O
red O
on O
Wednesday O
as O
the O
1996 O
edition O
of O
the O
world O
's O
biggest O
tomato O
fight O
began O
in O
the O
eastern O
Spanish S-MISC
village O
of O
Bunol S-LOC
. O

Thousands O
of O
people O
pelted O
each O
other O
with O
armfuls O
of O
ripe O
tomatoes O
as O
streets O
, O
walls O
and O
windows O
were O
coated O
in O
a O
blood-red O
wash O
. O

A O
single O
firework O
after O
midday O
signalled O
the O
start O
of O
the O
fruit-throwing O
frenzy O
, O
during O
which O
participants O
hurl O
some O
100 O
tonnes O
of O
tomatoes O
trucked O
in O
for O
the O
occasion O
. O

Local O
historians O
say O
the O
tradition O
began O
in O
1945 O
when O
disgruntled O
locals O
began O
spontaneously O
to O
bombard O
the O
priest O
and O
mayor O
at O
the O
annual O
fiesta O
in O
Bunol S-LOC
( O
pronounced O
Boo-nee-OL S-LOC
) O
. O

The O
festival O
's O
fame O
has O
grown O
and O
now O
attracts O
between O
15,000 O
and O
20,000 O
people O
, O
many O
of O
them O
foreigners O
. O

( O

" O

William B-PERSON
Fox E-PERSON
broke O

, O

. O

EU B-ORG
Commission E-ORG
cool O
on O
changing O
beef O
cull O
plan O
. O

BRUSSELS S-LOC
1996-08-29 O

The O
European B-ORG
Commission E-ORG
said O
on O
Thursday O
it O
would O
study O
scientific O
reports O
saying O
Britain S-LOC
's O
mad O
cow O
epidemic O
would O
die O
out O
by O
2001 O
but O
offered O
little O
prospect O
the O
findings O
would O
change O
an O
agreed O
slaughter O
campaign O
. O

" O
Obviously O
we O
are O
interested O
in O
this O
research O
. O

We O
will O
ask O
the O
( O
EU S-ORG
) O
scientific O
and O
veterinary O
committee O
to O
examine O
it O
, O
" O
Commission S-ORG
spokesman O
Gerard B-PERSON
Kiely E-PERSON
told O
Reuters S-ORG
. O

But O
he O
added O
that O
new O
research O
into O
the O
dynamics O
of O
the O
bovine O
spongiform O
encephalopathy O
( O
BSE S-MISC
) O
, O
a O
fatal O
brain-wasting O
disease O
suffered O
by O
cattle O
, O
was O
unlikely O
to O
alter O
a O
slaughter O
plan O
agreed O
by O
Britain S-LOC
and O
its O
14 O
EU S-ORG
partners O
. O

" O
We O
agreed O
that O
following O
detailed O
scientific O
analysis O
using O
a O
methodology O
which O
would O
take O
out O
the O
maximum O
number O
of O
BSE S-MISC
cases O
possible O
. O

I O
think O
it O
would O
be O
very O
difficult O
to O
sell O
to O
the O
European B-ORG
Commission E-ORG
a O
programme O
which O
would O
involve O
the O
elimination O
of O
fewer O
BSE S-MISC
cases O
, O
" O
Kiely S-PERSON
said O
. O

" O
We O
will O
look O
at O
our O
approach O
( O
to O
the O
plan O
) O
but O
we O
wo O
n't O
get O
involved O
with O
the O
number O
of O
animals O
to O
be O
slaughtered O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

" O
We O
have O
always O
avoided O
the O
question O
of O
numbers O
of O
animals O
to O
be O
slaughtered O
, O
that O
's O
not O
the O
issue O
. O

The O
issue O
is O
the O
protection O
of O
consumers O
' O
health O
and O
the O
rapid O
eradication O
of O
BSE S-MISC
, O
" O
he O
added O
. O

The O
reaction O
is O
likely O
to O
disappoint O
British S-MISC
farmers O
, O
who O
seized O
on O
research O
by O
Oxford S-ORG
scientists O
in O
the O
scientific O
journal O
Nature S-ORG
saying O
it O
would O
be O
hard O
to O
get O
rid O
of O
the O
disease O
any O
faster O
than O
2001 O
without O
killing O
vast O
numbers O
of O
cattle O
. O

The O
researchers O
predicted O
there O
would O
be O
340 O
new O
infections O
and O
14,000 O
new O
cases O
of O
BSE S-MISC
before O
2001 O
. O

British S-MISC
farmers O
' O
leader O
called O
on O
Wednesday O
for O
an O
urgent O
meeting O
with O
ministers O
to O
discuss O
the O
report O
. O

" O
I O
hope O
the O
government O
will O
now O
make O
it O
clear O
they O
believe O
there O
is O
a O
better O
way O
of O
dealing O
with O
this O
issue O
, O
" O
National B-ORG
Farmers I-ORG
Union E-ORG
president O
Sir O
David B-PERSON
Naish E-PERSON
told O
BBC B-ORG
radio E-ORG
. O

Naish S-PERSON
said O
there O
was O
no O

for O

to O

of O

. O

" O

new O
evidence O
to O

means O
some O
of O
that O
proposal O
should O
be O
re-examined O
because O
we O
could O
get O
away O

being O

if O
in O
fact O
scientists O
throughout O

, O
" O

. O

The O
report O
could O
well O
reopen O
a O

row O
between O
Britain S-LOC
and O
the O
EU S-ORG
, O

CRICKET O
- O
CROFT S-PERSON
RESTRICTS O
PAKISTAN S-LOC
TO O
225-5 O
. O

MANCHESTER S-LOC
, O
England S-LOC
1996-08-29 O

Tight O
bowling O
from O
Glamorgan S-ORG
off-spinner O
Robert B-PERSON
Croft E-PERSON
helped O
England S-LOC
to O
restrict O
Pakistan S-LOC
to O
225 O
for O
five O
in O
their O
50 O
overs O
in O
the O
first O
one-day O
international O
at O
Old B-LOC
Trafford E-LOC
on O
Thursday O
. O

Croft S-PERSON
, O
who O
was O
one O
of O
the O
few O
Englishmen S-MISC
to O
make O
a O
good O
impression O
in O
his O
test O
debut O
at O
The B-LOC
Oval E-LOC
last O
week O

showed O
great O
control O
as O
he O
first O
dried O
up O
the O
early O
flow O
of O
Pakistan S-LOC
runs O
and O
then O
collected O
the O

of O
Aamir B-PERSON
Sohail E-PERSON
and O

a O

of O
10-1-36-2 O
. O

a O

each O
for O

of O

( O

) O

on O

, O

of O

. O

. O

" O

, O

. O

of O

. O

, O

, O

and O
management O
permission O
is O
required O
to O
sell O
them O
. O

Gazprom S-ORG
has O
recently O
tightened O
these O
rules O
, O
making O
it O
harder O
for O
shareholders O
to O
sell O
to O
whoever O
they O
want O
, O
when O
they O
want O
. O

The O
company O
has O
organised O
regular O
auctions O
of O
its O
shares O
to O
create O
an O
orderly O
market O
in O
the O
paper O
. O

At O
the O
first O
auction O
on O
March O
6 O
, O
shares O
sold O
for O
an O
average O
406.6 O
roubles O
each O
, O
and O
prices O
have O
been O
rising O
steadily O
since O
then O
, O
but O
the O
rise O
in O
price O
this O
week O
and O
last O
was O
much O
less O
than O
in O
previous O
auctions O
. O

On O
the O
Russian B-MISC
Trading I-MISC
System E-MISC
, O
Gazprom S-ORG
shares O
rose O
25 O
percent O
on O
Thursday O
to O

0.375 O
from O
$ O
0.300 O
, O
after O
falling O
by O

a O

this O

. O

Researchers O
report O
progress O
in O
muscular O
dystrophy O
. O

PHILADELPHIA S-LOC
1996-08-29 O

University B-ORG
of I-ORG
Pennsylvania E-ORG
researchers O
on O
Thursday O
said O
a O
new O
gene-therapy O
technique O
for O
treating O
muscular O
dystrophy O
disease O
had O
shown O
progress O
in O
laboratory O
animals O
. O

Word O
of O
the O
findings O
, O
to O
be O
published O
in O
the O
Oct. O
1 O
issue O
of O
the O
journal O
" O
Human B-ORG
Gene I-ORG
Therapy E-ORG
, O
" O
came O
in O
advance O
of O
the O
annual O
Jerry B-MISC
Lewis I-MISC
Labour I-MISC
Day E-MISC
weekend O
telethon O
to O
raise O
money O
for O
muscular O
dystrophy O
research O
. O

Several O
hurdles O
must O
be O
overcome O
before O
the O
method O
is O
used O
in O
human O
trials O
. O

Nevertheless O
, O
" O
a O
treatment O
based O
on O
the O
new O
strategy O
.... O
may O
have O
the O
potential O
to O
benefit O
many O
patients O
, O
" O
the O
University B-ORG
of I-ORG
Pennsylvania E-ORG
Medical O
Centre O
said O
in O
a O
release O
. O

Muscular O
dystrophy O
is O
a O
fatal O
illness O
in O
which O
the O
body O
's O
muscle O
tissue O
degenerates O
and O
is O
replaced O
by O
fat O
. O

Death O
strikes O
in O
early O
adulthood O
. O

Individuals O
with O
the O
disease O
have O
a O
non-working O
version O
of O
a O
gene O
responsible O
for O
producing O
a O
crucial O
muscle O
protein O
called O
dystrophin O
. O

In O
the O
study O
at O
the O
University O
's O
Institute B-ORG
for I-ORG
Human I-ORG
Gene I-ORG
Therapy E-ORG
, O
researchers O
altered O
a O
common-cold O
virus O
to O
carry O
a O
version O
of O
the O
working O
dystrophin O
gene O
. O

The O
virus O
, O
which O
also O
was O
altered O
to O
minimise O
its O
susceptibility O
to O
the O
immune O
system O
, O
was O
then O
injected O
into O
the O
muscle O
cells O
of O
mice O
bred O
to O
lack O
dystrophin O
genes O
. O

In O
the O
experiment O
, O
between O
30 O
to O
40 O
percent O
of O
the O
muscle O
fibers O
in O
one O
group O
of O
mice O
produced O
dystrophin O
for O
two O
weeks O
before O
diminishing O
. O

Similar O
results O
had O
been O
obtained O
previously O
in O
test-tube O
cell O
cultures O
, O
but O
not O
in O
live O
animals O
, O
the O
university O
said O
. O

The O
university O
said O
methods O
are O
still O
needed O
to O
make O
enough O
of O
the O
altered O
virus O
to O
treat O
humans O
, O
to O
further O
decrease O
the O
immune-system O
response O
to O
the O
virus O
, O
and O
to O
deliver O
the O
virus O
to O
human O
muscle O
tissue O
. O

NEW B-LOC
YORK E-LOC
1996-08-29 O

The O
help-wanted O
advertising O
index O
fell O
in O
July O
, O
the O
Conference B-ORG
Board E-ORG
said O
Thursday O
, O
reflecting O
the O
uneven O
nature O
of O
the O
nation O
's O
labour O
markets O
. O

The O
monthly O
index O
fell O
to O
83.0 O
in O
July O
against O
a O
reading O
of O
85.0 O
in O
June O
, O
the O
private O
business O
research O
group O
said O
. O

In O
July O
, O
the O
volume O
of O
help-wanted O
advertising O
fell O
in O
five O
of O
the O
nine O
U.S. S-LOC
regions O
. O

" O
The O
labour O
market O
has O
been O
expanding O
throughout O
1996 O
, O
but O
in O
a O
very O
uneven O
pattern O
, O
" O
Conference B-ORG
Board E-ORG
economist O
Ken B-PERSON
Goldstein E-PERSON
said O
. O
" O

Recent O
want-ad O
figures O
indicate O
that O
conservative O
hiring O
plans O
are O
keeping O
job O
growth O
below O
the O
rate O
of O
overall O
economic O
activity O
. O
" O

With O
2.5 O
percent O
gross O
domestic O
product O
growth O
expected O
for O
1996 O
, O
new O
job O
growth O
should O
slowly O
lower O
the O
unemployment O
rate O
over O
the O
rest O
of O
the O
year O
. O

" O
With O
the O
unemployment O
rate O
staying O
close O
to O
about O
5.5 O
percent O
over O
the O
last O
two O
years O
, O
there O
is O
a O
good O
chance O
the O
rate O
will O
slowly O
drop O
to O
about O
5.0 O
percent O
by O
the O
end O
of O
the O
year O
, O
" O
Goldstein S-PERSON
said O
. O

The O
July O
index O
matched O
the O
reading O
for O
July O
, O
1995 O
. O

The O
greatest O
declines O
in O

of O

were O
in O

New B-LOC

, O

and O
West B-LOC

Central E-LOC
regions O
. O

The O
greatest O
increase O
was O
in O

Central E-LOC
region O
. O

Police O
seek O

in O
Atlantic B-LOC
City E-LOC
jewel O
heist O
. O

ATLANTIC B-LOC
CITY E-LOC
, O

JAKARTA S-LOC
1996-08-29 O

Indonesia S-LOC
sought O
on O
Thursday O
to O

down O
a O

attack O
on O
a O

consulate O
earlier O
this O

, O
saying O

was O
being O

as O
a O
criminal O
rather O
than O
a O

, O
the O
official O
Antara S-LOC
news O
agency O
said O
. O

The O

are O
still O
investigating O
the O
incident O
. O

It O
is O
evident O
the O
happening O
is O
not O
politically O
motivated O
but O
just O
an O
ordinary O
criminal O
act O
, O

agency O
quoted O
East B-MISC

Utomo S-PERSON
as O
saying O
. O

The O

on O

in O

of O

, O

to O
a O

before O

extinguished O
, O

at O

in O
Jakarta S-LOC
, O
700 O
km O
( O

) O

of O

. O

HONG B-LOC
KONG E-LOC
1996-08-29 O

Senior O
Hong B-LOC
Kong E-LOC
civil O
servants O
were O
given O
the O
go-ahead O
on O
Thursday O
to O
challenge O
a O
government O
ban O
on O
them O
standing O
for O
the O
Beijing-backed S-MISC
panel O
to O
choose O
the O
territory O
's O
first O
post-handover O
leader O
and O
lawmakers O
. O

The O
Supreme B-ORG
Court E-ORG
ruled O
that O
a O
judicial O
hearing O
contesting O
the O
ban O
would O
be O
heard O
on O
September O
11 O
, O
three O
days O
before O
the O
nomination O
period O
for O
the O
Selection B-ORG
Committee E-ORG
closes O
. O

The O
government O
maintains O
the O
ban O
, O
announced O
earlier O
this O
month O
, O
is O
necessary O
to O
avoid O
a O
possible O
conflict O
of O
interest O
because O
civil O
servants O
are O
involved O
in O
determining O
government O
policy O
. O

Civil O
servants O
argue O
the O
ban O
stymies O
their O
political O
rights O
. O

The O
400-strong O
Selection B-ORG
Committee E-ORG
will O
select O
Hong B-LOC
Kong E-LOC
's O
future O
chief O
executive O
to O
replace O
the O
British S-MISC
governor O
and O
a O
provisional O
legislature O
to O
take O
over O
from O
the O
elected O
chamber O
which O
Beijing S-LOC
plans O
to O
dissolve O
. O

Hong B-LOC
Kong E-LOC
, O
a O
British S-MISC
colony O
for O
more O
than O
150 O
years O
, O
will O
be O
handed O
back O
to O
China S-LOC
at O
midnight O
on O
June O
30 O
next O
year O
. O

China S-LOC
intends O
to O
dismantle O
the O
territory O
's O
first O
fully-elected O
legislature O
because O
it O
opposes O
Britain S-LOC
's O
recent O
electoral O
reforms O
and O
install O
an O
interim O
appointed O
chamber O
, O
a O
decision O
that O
has O
generated O
considerable O
controversy O
. O

The O
judicial O
review O
sought O
by O
directorate-grade O
bureaucrats O
will O
apply O
to O
only O
about O
1,000 O
of O
the O
approximately O
33,000 O
civil O
servants O
affected O
. O

Police O
unions O
are O
not O
contesting O
the O
ban O
, O
which O
affects O
all O
27,000 O
officers O
, O
and O
nor O
are O
the O
very O

of O
Hong B-LOC

. O

. O

. O

LONDON S-LOC
1996-12-06 O

Dutch S-MISC
forward O
Reggie B-PERSON
Blinker E-PERSON
had O
his O
indefinite O

lifted O
by O
FIFA S-ORG
on O
Friday O
and O
was O
set O
to O
make O
his O
Sheffield B-ORG
Wednesday E-ORG

against O
Liverpool S-ORG
on O
Saturday O
. O

Blinker S-PERSON
missed O
his O
club O
's O
last O
two O
games O
after O
FIFA S-ORG
slapped O
a O
worldwide O
ban O
on O
him O
for O
appearing O
to O
sign O
contracts O
for O
both O
Wednesday S-ORG
and O
Udinese S-ORG
while O
he O
was O
playing O
for O
Feyenoord S-ORG
. O

FIFA S-ORG
's O
players O
' O
status O
committee O
, O
meeting O
in O
Barcelona S-LOC
, O
decided O
that O
although O
the O
Udinese S-ORG
document O
was O
basically O
valid O
, O
it O
could O
not O
be O
legally O
protected O
. O

The O
committee O
said O
the O
Italian S-MISC
club O
had O
violated O
regulations O
by O
failing O
to O
inform O
Feyenoord S-ORG
, O
with O
whom O
the O
player O
was O
under O
contract O
. O

Blinker S-PERSON
was O
fined O
75,000 O
Swiss S-MISC
francs O
( O
$ O
57,600 O
) O
for O
failing O
to O
inform O

to O

LOMBARDI B-MISC
AWARD E-MISC
WINNER O
. O

HOUSTON S-LOC
1996-12-05 O

Ohio B-ORG
State E-ORG
left O
tackle O
Orlando B-PERSON
Pace E-PERSON
became O
the O
first O
repeat O
winner O
of O
the O
Lombardi B-MISC
Award E-MISC
Thursday O
night O
when O
the O

Club E-ORG
of O
Houston S-LOC
again O
honoured O
him O
as O
college O
football O
's O
lineman O
of O
the O
year O
. O

Pace S-PERSON
, O
a O
junior O
, O
helped O
Ohio B-ORG
State E-ORG
to O
a O
10-1 O
record O
and O
a O
berth O
in O
the O
Rose B-MISC
Bowl E-MISC
against O
Arizona B-ORG
State E-ORG
. O

was O
the O
most O

offensive O
lineman O
in O
the O
country O

also O
played O
defensive O
line O
in O

the O
first O

to O
win O
the O
award O
since O

in O

Virginia B-ORG

and O
defensive O
end O
Jared B-PERSON

of O
Nebraska S-ORG
. O

Lombardi B-MISC
Award E-MISC
is O
presented O
to O
the O
college O
lineman O
who O
, O
in O
addition O
to O
outstanding O
effort O
on O
the O
field O

best O

production O
. O

SINGAPORE S-LOC
1996-12-06 O

Indian S-MISC
rubber O
demand O
is O
seen O
outpacing O
local O
production O
in O
the O
1996/97 O
April O
/ O
March O
season O
and O
the O
trend O
will O
persist O
way O
into O
the O
next O
century O
, O
the O
chairman O
of O
the O
Rubber B-ORG
Board I-ORG
of I-ORG

said O
on O
Friday O
. O

K.J. B-PERSON
Matthew E-PERSON
said O
at O
the O
Asia B-MISC
Rubber I-MISC
Markets I-MISC
meeting E-MISC
here O
Indian S-MISC
production O
of O
natural O
rubber O
in O
1996/97 O
will O
reach O
547,000 O
tonnes O
against O
projected O
demand O
of O
578,000 O
tonnes O
, O
a O
gap O
of O
31,000 O
tonnes O
. O

For O
synthetic O
rubber O
, O
production O
reached O
68,200 O
tonnes O
in O
1995/96 O
while O
consumption O
in O
the O
same O
season O
hit O
134,085 O
tonnes O
, O
Matthew S-PERSON
added O
. O

" O
Though O
schemes O
designed O
to O
realise O
further O
increases O
in O
the O
production O
of O
natural O
rubber O
are O
being O
operated O
successfully O
, O
the O
demand-supply O
gap O
is O
expected O
to O
widen O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

Indian S-MISC
synthetic O
rubber O
output O
is O
not O
expected O
to O
rise O
significantly O
in O
the O
next O
season O
but O
demand O
will O
rise O
to O
145,000 O
tonnes O
. O

Matthew S-PERSON
estimates O
that O
by O
the O
2000/01 O
season O
, O

gap O
between O

rubber O
output O
and O
consumption O
will O
rise O
to O
51,000 O
tonnes O
and O
319,000 O
tonnes O
in O
2010/11 O
. O

Natural O
rubber O
production O
will O
go O
up O
to O
695,000 O
tonnes O
in O
2000/01 O
against O
consumption O
of O
746,000 O
tonnes O
. O

In O
2010/11 O
, O

demand O
should O
rise O
further O
to O
1.233 O
million O
tonnes O
while O
production O
will O
only O
reach O
about O
914,000 O
tonnes O
. O

One O

to O

is O
to O
put O
more O

under O

which O

Board E-ORG
official O

will O

" O

" O

Haitham B-ORG

on O
Friday O

. O

The O

, O

of O

) O

with O

Lahd S-PERSON
, O

, O

in O

on O

. O

said O
a O

16 O
that O

must O

. O

said O

was O

to O

. O

The O

against O

were O
: O

's O

Half O
of O
dog O
bites O
