, O
says O
American S-MISC
vet O
. O

CHICAGO S-LOC
1996-12-06 O

As O
many O
as O
1 O
million O
dog O
bites O
are O
recorded O
in O
the O
United B-LOC
States E-LOC
every O
year O
and O
half O
of O
them O
are O
provoked O
by O
humans O
, O
a O
veterinarian O
told O
fellow O
animal O
doctors O
on O
Friday O
. O

The O
Humane O
Society O
of O
the O
United B-LOC
States E-LOC
estimates O
that O
between O
500,000 O
and O
one O
million O
bites O
are O
delivered O
by O
dogs O
each O
year O
, O
more O
than O
half O
of O
which O
are O
suffered O
by O
children O
. O

" O
Most O
bites O
can O
be O
prevented O
by O
teaching O
children O
how O
to O
respect O
a O
dog O
, O
" O
Michael B-PERSON
Cornwell E-PERSON
of O
the O
Glencoe B-ORG
Animal I-ORG
Hospital E-ORG
in O
Columbus S-LOC
, O
Ohio S-LOC
, O
told O
the O
annual O
meeting O
of O
the O
American B-ORG
Veterinary I-ORG
Medical I-ORG
Association E-ORG
. O

" O
Let O
's O
not O
let O
our O
kids O
jump O
on O
them O
or O
crawl O
on O
them O
. O

Dogs O
and O
children O
do O
n't O
have O
to O
have O
an O
interaction O
. O

Let O
's O
respect O
their O
territories O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

Cornwell S-PERSON
said O
50 O
percent O
of O
reported O
bites O
were O
provoked O
by O
a O
person O
and O
60 O
percent O
were O
suffered O
by O
children O
. O

He O
also O
estimated O
that O
only O
25 O
percent O
of O
bites O
were O
reported O
because O
medical O
attention O
was O
not O
needed O
. O

Don B-PERSON
Rieck E-PERSON
, O
president O
of O
the O
National B-ORG
Animal I-ORG
Control I-ORG
Association E-ORG
, O
said O
aggressiveness O
in O
dogs O
was O
related O
more O
to O
gender O
than O
breed O
and O
a O
male O

not O
been O

was O
three O
times O
more O
likely O
to O
bite O
than O
an O

female O
. O

The O

credited O

most O
incidents O
were O
chow O

, O
Rottweilers S-MISC
, O
German B-MISC

, O

and O

. O
" O

trends O
in O

by O

have O
more O
to O
do O
with O

of O

was O
a O

. O

Today O
, O
Rottweilers S-MISC
are O
on O
the O
way O
up O
, O
" O

said O
. O

If O

EU S-ORG
, O
Poland S-LOC
agree O
on O
oil O
import O
tariffs O
. O

BRUSSELS S-LOC
1996-12-06 O

The O
European B-ORG
Union E-ORG
and O
Poland S-LOC
have O
resolved O
disagreements O
over O
a O
new O
Polish S-MISC
oil O
import O
regime O
, O
the O
European B-ORG
Commission E-ORG
said O
on O
Friday O
. O

The O
EU S-ORG
had O
objected O
to O
increases O
in O
Polish S-MISC
tariffs O
on O
imports O
of O
gasoline O
and O
gasoil O
products O
introduced O
on O
January O
1 O
, O
1996 O
, O
saying O
they O
contravened O
levels O
envisaged O
in O
the O
so-called O
Europe S-LOC
Agreement O
between O
the O
EU S-ORG
and O
Poland S-LOC
. O

The O
increases O
were O
aimed O
at O
protecting O
the O
Polish S-MISC
market O
while O
helping O
to O
modernise O
the O
local O
oil O
industry O
. O

" O
The O
EU S-ORG
and O
Poland S-LOC
have O
now O
reached O
a O
final O
settlement O
regarding O
issues O
related O
to O
the O
Polish S-MISC
import O
regime O
in O
the O
oils O
sector O
, O
" O
the O
Commission S-ORG
said O
in O
a O
statement O
. O

Under O
the O
agreement O
, O
Poland S-LOC
will O
abolish O
all O
oil O
import O
tariffs O
by O
2001 O
, O
remove O
all O
oil O
price O
controls O
and O
end O
quantitative O
restrictions O
on O
imports O
by O
January O
1 O
, O
1997 O
. O

The O
agreement O
includes O
the O
early O
privatisation O
and O
modernisation O
of O
Polish S-MISC
oil O
refineries O
, O
which O
will O
be O
obliged O
to O
offer O
equal O
treatment O
to O
all O
buyers O
. O

The O
EU S-ORG
and O
Poland S-LOC
will O
monitor O
the O
settlement O
at O
six-monthly O
meetings O
. O

. O

( O

. O

. O

of O

in O

of O

than O

were O

. O

in O
the O
city O
three O
months O
later O
that O
killed O
260 O
people O
. O

backs O
a O

to O

to O

's O

FEATURE O
- O
Singapore S-LOC
sees O
prestige O
in O
hosting O
WTO S-ORG
. O

Ramthan B-PERSON
Hussain E-PERSON

SINGAPORE S-LOC
1996-12-06 O

Singapore S-LOC
's O
winning O
campaign O
to O
host O
the O
World B-ORG
Trade I-ORG
Organisation E-ORG
( O
WTO S-ORG
) O
's O
first O

meeting O
reflected O
its O
ambition O
to O
play O
a O
key O
role O
in O
shaping O
global O
free O
trade O
, O
the O
lifeblood O
of O
its O

, O
analysts O
said O
. O

" O

of O
the O

's O
most O

oriented O
economies O
, O
Singapore S-LOC
has O
a O

in O
the O
WTO S-ORG
, O
" O
said O
Desmond B-PERSON
Supple E-PERSON
, O

. O

" O

stands O
to O

from O

as O

, O

for O
nearly O
three O
times O
its O
gross O

. O
" O

The O
city-state O
met O
U.S. S-LOC
opposition O
two O

ago O
in O

to O

, O
expected O
to O

from O

. O

a O

linked O
to O

over O

's O

of O
an O

for O

, O

GOLF O
- O
THIRD O
ROUND O
OF O
JCPENNEY B-MISC
CLASSIC E-MISC
WASHED O
OUT O
. O

TARPON B-LOC
SPRINGS E-LOC
, O
Florida S-LOC
1996-12-07 O

Heavy O
rains O
on O
Saturday O
washed O
out O
the O
third O
round O
of O
the O
$ O
1.5 O
million O
JCPenney B-MISC
Classic E-MISC
at O
the O
Innisbrook B-LOC
Hilton I-LOC
Resort E-LOC
. O

Officials O
said O
the O
tournament O
would O
be O
reduced O
to O
54 O
holes O
for O
the O
first O
time O
in O
its O
37-year O
history O
. O

The O
final O
round O
of O
the O
special O
event O
, O
which O
pairs O
players O
from O
the O
PGA S-ORG
and O
LPGA S-ORG
Tours O
, O
will O
be O
played O
in O
the O
alternate O
shot O
format O
on O
Sunday O
. O

The O
duo O
of O
Pat B-PERSON
Hurst E-PERSON
and O
Scott B-PERSON
McCarron E-PERSON
were O
tied O
for O
the O
lead O
with O
the O
team O
of O
Donna B-PERSON
Andrews E-PERSON
and O
Mike B-PERSON
Hulbert E-PERSON
at O
13-under-par O
129 O
through O
36 O
holes O
. O

The O
tandem O
of O
reigning O
U.S. S-LOC
Amateur O
champions O
Kelli B-PERSON
Kuehne E-PERSON
and O
Tiger B-PERSON

were O
another O
shot O
back O
at O
12-under O
130 O
. O

and O

start O

off O
the O
pace O
. O

BOBSLEIGH-SHIMER S-MISC
PILOTS O
USA B-ORG
III E-ORG
TO O
SURPRISE O
WIN O
. O

IGLS S-LOC
, O
Austria S-LOC
1996-12-07 O

Brian B-PERSON
Shimer E-PERSON
piloted O
USA B-ORG
III E-ORG
to O
a O
surprise O
victory O
in O
a O
World B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
two-man O
bobsleigh O
race O
on O
Saturday O
. O

Lying O
fifth O
after O
the O
first O
run O
, O
Shimer S-PERSON
and O
breakman O
Randy B-PERSON
Jones E-PERSON
delivered O
a O
near-perfect O
second O
trip O
down O
the O
1976 O
Olympic S-MISC
course O
for O
an O
aggregate O
time O
of O
one O
minute O
45.91 O
seconds O
. O

First O
run O
leaders O
Guenther B-PERSON
Huber E-PERSON
and O
breakman O
Antonio B-PERSON
Tartaglia E-PERSON
in O
the O
Italy S-LOC
I O
sleigh O
finished O
second O

of O

CRICKET O
- O
WOOLMER S-PERSON
MAKES O
SENTIMENTAL O
RETURN O
TO O
KANPUR S-LOC
. O

KANPUR S-LOC
, O
India S-LOC
1996-12-07 O

South B-LOC
Africa E-LOC
's O
trip O
to O
Kanpur S-LOC
for O
the O
third O
test O
against O
India S-LOC
has O
given O
former O
England S-LOC
test O
cricketer O
Bob B-PERSON
Woolmer E-PERSON
the O
chance O
of O
a O
sentimental O
return O
to O
his O
birthplace O
. O

Woolmer S-PERSON
was O
born O
in O
the O
northern O
city O
of O
Kanpur S-LOC
when O
his O
father O
worked O
there O
for O
an O
insurance O
compnay O
and O
was O
himself O
an O
active O
cricketer O
. O

" O
It O
's O
been O
a O
sentimental O
journey O
... O

A O
visit O
to O
India S-LOC
is O
always O
an O
intriguing O
experience O
, O
" O
Woolmer S-PERSON
, O
now O
the O
South B-MISC
African E-MISC
coach O
, O
said O
on O
Saturday O
. O

Woolmer S-PERSON
, O
48 O
, O
played O
19 O
tests O
for O
England S-LOC
between O
1975 O
and O
1981 O
. O

His O
first O
cricketing O
sojurn O
to O
India S-LOC
was O
as O
a O
member O
of O
Tony B-PERSON
Greig E-PERSON
's O
England S-LOC
side O
in O
1976-77 O
. O

His O
father O
Clarence B-PERSON
Woolmer E-PERSON
represented O
United B-LOC
Province E-LOC
, O
now O
renamed O
Uttar B-LOC
Pradesh E-LOC
, O
in O
India S-LOC
's O
Ranji B-MISC
Trophy E-MISC
national O
championship O
and O
captained O
the O
state O
during O
1949 O
. O

Now O
aged O
86 O
, O
Woolmer S-PERSON
senior O
lives O
with O
his O
son O
in O
Cape B-LOC
Town E-LOC
. O

Woolmer S-PERSON
's O
memories O
of O
Kanpur S-LOC
are O
few O
and O
blurred O
. O

" O
I O
do O
n't O
remember O
much O
of O
the O
place O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O
" O

I O
came O
here O
on O
zero O
and O
left O
at O
three O
( O
aged O
three O
) O
when O
my O
father O
was O
transferred O
to O
Calcutta S-LOC
where O
I O
spent O
another O
four O
and O
half O
years O
. O

" O
But O
I O
do O
remember O
we O
had O
a O
cobra O
snake O
in O
the O
basement O
of O
our O
house O
. O

Also O
that O
my O
father O
bought O
a O
bicycle O
and O
when O
we O
rode O
over O
a O
hose O
pipe O
it O
broke O
into O
two O
. O
" O

Woolmer S-PERSON
said O
the O
hospital O
where O
he O
was O

close O
to O

stadium O
where O
the O
India-South B-MISC

test O
will O
be O

ALPINE O
SKIING-OFFICIALS O
HOPE O
TO O
SALVAGE O
WORLD B-MISC
CUP E-MISC
WEEKEND O
. O

WHISTLER S-LOC
, O
British B-LOC
Columbia E-LOC
1996-12-06 O

World B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
ski O
officials O
hope O
to O
be O
able O
to O
get O
in O
at O
least O
one O
men O
's O
downhill O
training O
run O
on O
Saturday O
in O
an O
effort O
to O
salvage O
the O
weekend O
racing O
programme O
. O

For O
the O
third O
consecutive O
day O
, O
Friday O
's O
scheduled O
training O
runs O
were O
cancelled O
due O
to O
heavy O
wet O
snow O
and O
fog O
on O
Whistler B-LOC
Mountain E-LOC
, O
leaving O
the O
scheduled O
World B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
events O
in O
jeopardy O
. O

Rules O
call O
for O
at O
least O
one O
training O
run O
to O
be O
completed O
before O
a O
World B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
downhill O
race O
can O
be O
staged O
. O

Organisers O
hope O
to O
get O
that O
run O
in O
on O
Saturday O
morning O
, O
conditions O
permitting O
, O
and O
stage O
the O
race O
later O
in O
the O
day O
or O
on O
Sunday O
. O

" O
There O
was O
no O
possibility O
today O
to O
make O
a O
training O
run O
, O
" O
said O
Bernd B-PERSON
Zobel E-PERSON
, O
the O
Canadian S-MISC
men O
's O
national O
coach O
, O
citing O
too O
much O
new O
snow O
and O
poor O
visibility O
. O

If O

are O
forced O
to O
run O
the O
downhill O
on O
Sunday O
, O
the O
super-giant O
slalom O
originally O
scheduled O
for O
Sunday O
would O
likely O
be O
abandoned O
. O

UNION E-ORG

against O
Northern B-LOC

after O

- O

AS O

BACK O
. O

HOBART S-LOC
, O

1996-12-07 O

SOCCER O
- O
ENGLISHMAN S-MISC
CHARLTON S-PERSON
IS O

AN O
HONORARY O
IRISHMAN S-MISC
. O

DUBLIN S-LOC
1996-12-07 O

Jack B-PERSON

's O
relationship O
with O
the O
people O
of O
Ireland S-LOC
was O

on O

. O

, O

, O

, O

of O

" O

was O
the O

all O

over O
the O
period O
, O

added O
. O

Charlton S-PERSON
managed O
Ireland S-LOC
for O
93 O
matches O
, O
during O
which O
time O
they O
lost O
only O
17 O
times O
in O

he O
resigned O
in O
December O
1995 O
. O

He O
guided O
Ireland S-LOC
to O
two O
successive O
World B-MISC
Cup E-MISC
finals O
tournaments O
and O
to O
the O
1988 O
European S-MISC
championship O
finals O
in O
Germany S-LOC
, O
after O
the O
Irish S-MISC
beat O
a O
well-fancied O

team O
1-0 O
in O
their O
group O
qualifier O
. O

The O
lanky O
former O
Leeds B-ORG
United E-ORG
defender O
did O
not O
make O
his O

debut O
until O

30 O
